description: Aplikacja zawiera pełną aktualną bazę graficzną kuponów promocyjnych do restauracji KFC, a także aktualny cennik produktów w restauracjach i dowozie. ** Płać mniej! ** Wybierz kupon i pokaż go na ekranie telefonu podczas składania zamówienia. ** Kupony można wykorzystywać wielokrotnie! ** NOWOŚĆ!!! Sprawdzaj informacje o składnikach odżywczych produktów. Funkcjonalności: - LISTA - Lista aktualnych kuponów promocyjnych - KUPONY - Aktualne kupony rabatowe wraz ze zdjęciami podglądowymi - CENNIK W RESTAURACJACH - Cennik produktów w restauracjach - CENNIK W DOSTAWIE - Cennik produktów w dowozie - Nawigacja po aplikacji za pomocą gestów palca (przesunięcie w lewo / prawo) - Nawigacja po pełnoekranowych kuponach za pomocą palca (przesunięcie w lewo / prawo) - Możliwość powiększania / pomniejszania pełnoekranowego kuponu - Możliwość zmiany zakładki startowej (ikona w prawym-górnym rogu) - Możliwość sprawdzenia informacji o składnikach odżywczych Aby pokazać kupon w najlepszej jakości na pełnym ekranie należy kliknąć na wybrany kupon z listy (LISTA lub KUPONY). Kupony najlepiej pokazywać w pozycji poziomej telefonu - wtedy zajmuje on cały ekran urządzenia. Kupony ważne są do 29.02.2016. Jak tylko pojawią się nowe, aplikacja zostanie zaktualizowana. Należy pamiętać, że jest to aplikacja nieoficjalna. The application includes the full current database graphical promotional coupons to KFC, as well as the current price list of products in restaurants and getting my. ** Pay less! ** Select coupon and show it on your phone when ordering. ** The vouchers can be used repeatedly! ** NOVELTY!!! Find out about nutritional products. Functionalities: - LIST - A list of current promotional coupons - Coupons - Current coupons with the viewing photographs - PRICE LIST RESTAURANTS - Prices of products in restaurants - PRICE LIST DELIVERY - Prices of products in getting my - Navigation application using finger gestures (pan left / right) - Navigate full screen with your finger slips (offset left / right) - Ability to zoom in / out full screen coupon - Possibility to change the home tab (the icon in the upper-right corner) - Ability to verify information on nutrients To show the coupon for the best quality at full screen by clicking on the selected coupon from the list (or coupons). Coupons best showing in a horizontal position the phone - then occupies the entire screen of the device. Coupons are valid until 02/29/2016. As soon as new, the application will be updated. Please note that this is an unofficial app.

Twój grafik jest za każdym razem inny? Nigdy nie wiesz ile godzin przepracowałeś(-aś) w ubiegłym miesiącu/tygodniu? Wypróbuj tej aplikacji. Wystarczy, że na bieżąco będziesz wprowadzać swoje godziny pracy, a na koniec każdego miesiąca bądź tygodnia otrzymasz pełne podsumowanie: - ilość przepracowanych godzin - spodziewane wynagrodzenie Pracujesz z różnymi stawkami? - Aplikacja pozwala na zdefiniowanie dwóch trybów pracy - dziennego i nocnego, dla trybu nocnego możesz ustawić oddzielne wynagrodzenie. Pracujesz na umowę zlecenie - prawdopodobnie jest to coś dla Ciebie! Your schedule is different each time? You never know how many hours you have worked (year-round) last month / week? Try this application. Just that on a regular basis will make your working hours, and at the end of each month or week, you will receive a full summary: - Number of hours worked - Expected salary You work with different rates? - The application allows you to define two modes of operation - day and night, night mode, you can set separate wage. Working on contract work - this is probably something for you!
release_text: W dalszym ciągu kontynuowane jest wprowadzanie nowego designu. Ponadto w części "Moje zarobki" dodano możliwość wyboru okresu wypłaty wynagrodzenia. Jeżeli Twój pracodawca rozlicza się z Tobą w okresach tygodniowych, możesz korzystając z ustawień wybrać taki okres rozliczeń. Podsumowania zarobków będą wtedy wyświetlane dla każdego tygodnia! Małym dodatkiem jest również możliwość udania się bezpośrednio do podanej daty w kalendarzu

description: Have you been catched by urgent necessity? Are you in foreign place and you don’t know where is the nearest toilet? Find the closest one only with NextToilet! There is no better way to find there in the right time! Thanks to current user localization, application will guide you where you should go in this tough moment. Application provides thousand of toilets all over the world, for example: Poland, France, Belgium, Netherlands, Austria, Great Britain, Australia, USA and much more (and it is still growing!). All toilets in our database hold informations about availability for women, men or disabled access. This application have knowledge if you need to pay to use the toilet. What is more, thanks to the grade system, you can easilly check the level of cleanliness. Are you going abroad, to unknown place or just to other city which you don’t know? After first launch and synchronization, you will be able to use the application WITHOUT ACCESS TO THE INTERNET. With synchronization after every starts of application you will be up to date with all new available places. System of bad toilets reports allows us to catching the wrong informations and correct them immediately. Map and list views will intuitive guide you to the closest places. Possibility to add a new toilets from application will make our database bigger which is equal to increasing satisfaction of other users. Besides this: * Navigation to the clostest toilet * Neighberhood with Google Street View * Many types of maps (normal, hybrid, sattelite, terrain) * Support for multiple languages The application uses publicly available data and data received from users of the NextToilet app.
release_text: 1.13 * Minor bug fixes 1.12 * Minor bug fixes 1.10 * Minor bug fixes 1.9 * Fix crush when resume application (without gps) 1.8.1 * Minor bug fixes * Fix crush when zooming on map * Fix crush which appeared while resuming app 1.8 * Fix crushes when scrolling down the toilet list * Prettier icons 1.7 * Minor bug fixes * Increase map performance

description: Farm Animal Sounds for Kids - entertain your toddler with with pictures and sounds of adorable farm animals. Designed especially for toddlers 1.5 to 5 years, this exciting and educational game will teach your kids names of farm animals and their sounds. Gameplay is very simple and suited for younger children - when the sound of a farm animal is played your kid needs to touch on a friendly picture of a correct animal. The pictures are big and colorful so it is easy for your kid's small fingers to touch it, but at the beginning your assistance might be helpful for younger children. Featuring HD cartoony graphics of adorable animals and real farm animal sounds this game guarantees a lot of fun for your lovely kids! Made by Mommy and Daddy and tested by their lovely daughter! Main features: - Sweet, cartoony graphics of farm kid animals, - Real, high quality sounds of farm animals, - 2 difficulty levels - endless mode for toddlers up to 3 years and time-boxed mode for the older kids (kindergarten age), - High Definition (HD) graphics for your Android phones and tablets, - Free, Ads support development of future updates and new games for kids. Includes pictures and sounds of the following animals: * Cat, * Cow, * Dog, * Donkey, * Duck, * Goat, * Horse, * Pig, * Rabbit, * Rooster, * Sheep, * Turkey.
release_text: Merry, Merry Christmas everybody. Santa Claus has the present for you to celebrate the coming of Christmas Holiday. Christmas objects, including Santa Claus, Snowman, Christmas tree, Santa's reindeer, Christmas elf and Christmas sock are waiting for you in a new game Three Pieces - Xmas Puzzle. Available directly from Farm Animal Sounds for Kids Menu.

description: Zestaw polskich kart do gry w Taboo (Tabu). Składa się z ponad 2500 unikalnych kart. UWAGA! To jest dodatek do gry Taboo. Aby działał poprawnie, należy najpierw zainstalować podstawową (darmową) wersję gry. UWAGA! Na niektórych urządzeniach zauważono, że po instalacji dodatku gra przestaje się uruchamiać. Należy wtedy odinstalować zarówno grę jak i dodatek, i zainstalować je ponownie w kolejności: Taboo (gra), później Taboo polskie karty. (Oczywiście opłata zostanie pobrana tylko raz)
release_text: == wersja 2.0 == Aktualizacja w związku z nową wersją Taboo.

description: This simple and light application generates random numbers from specific range. It has a function that generates numbers at selected time.

CZATeria to anonimowa, darmowa i prosta w obsłudze aplikacja, z której możesz korzystać bez rejestracji. W aplikacji czatowej znajdziesz kilkadziesiąt pokoi podzielonych na kategorie regionalne, towarzyskie czy tematyczne. Spotkasz tu tysiące osób online w różnym wieku i z różnymi zainteresowaniami. Aplikacja w prosty i intuicyjny sposób pozwala na zawieranie nowych, ciekawych znajomości bez wychodzenia z domu a dzięki rozbudowanemu systemowi powiadomień żadna wiadomość cię nie ominie. Gestami lewo-prawo w łatwy sposób przełączasz się między pokojami lub rozmowami prywatnymi. Możesz otwierać nowe pokoje oraz rozpoczynać nowe rozmowy, podczas których prześlesz zdjęcia wykonane telefonem lub dołączyć jedno ze zdjęć znajdujących się w galerii telefonu. Aplikacja czatowa, to najlepszy sposób, by poznawać nowych ludzi i być w stałym kontakcie ze znajomymi nie tylko w domu, ale także w autobusie czy na uczelni. Koniec z nudą! CZAT to miejsce, gdzie możesz porozmawiać na dowolny temat o każdej porze. CZATeria is anonymous, free and easy to use application, which you can use without registering. In the application, you will find dozens of chat rooms divided into categories of regional, social or thematic. You'll meet people online find thousands of different ages and with different interests. The application in a simple and intuitive way allows you to meet new, interesting acquaintances without leaving home thanks to a sophisticated system of notification no message will not miss. The left-right gesture to easily switch between rooms or private conversations. You can open new rooms and start a new conversation, during which you upload pictures taken on the phone or join one of the photos in your gallery. Chatting app, is the best way to meet new people and keep in touch with friends not only at home but also on the bus or at the university. No more boredom! CHAT is a place where you can talk on any subject at any time.
release_text: Co nowego w tej wersji: - nowa funkcjonalność - przesyłanie zdjęć podczas rozmowy prywatnej - poprawa stabilności aplikacji, - poprawa drobnych błędów Pozdrawiamy, Zespół CZATeria

developer: Jojo Mobile Polska sp. z o.o
description: "Funny Stories – Colorful Vitamins " is a fun, rhyming tale that tells the story of different fruits and vegetables. Children can listen about apple, carrot and many many more. As the story unfolds, various fruits and vegetables tell the story about their live and vitamins. Story can be narrated with Male and Female voice. New features only available in this interactive Funny Stories for your Android, include professional female and male narration, background audio and beautiful artwork for each scene. By combining the original text, artwork and sounds with features that entertain and promote reading, this Funny Stories book appeals to readers of all ages.Three ways to read this Funny Stories – Colorful Vitamins (JOJO Mobile digital book): • "Read to Me" — listen to the narrated story • "Read it Myself" — read the book in its traditional form • "Auto Play" — plays like a movie, automatically reading and turning pages. Great for younger children!Additional Features: • Picture / Word association — words zoom up and are spoken when pictures are touched • Professional male and female audio narration
release_text: small bugs fixed, louder reader background

description: AMAZING OFFER! 67% off to celebrate the launch of FLASHOUT 2!!! "Suspect in Sight is a great game, it’s easy to pick-up and play, the graphics are good and it’ll make you chuckle as you play. What more could you want?" Score: 5/5 (androidheadlines.com) ★★★★★ Don’t be indifferent, join the Force! “Suspect in Sight!” is the most awesome cops ‘n robbers action game on this side of the galaxy! 30 missions, 3 cities to discover, XP points to collect, 4 choppers to master, sarcastic humor, cool story and many unlockables! "Take to the skies in this aggressive, bad-guy demolition derby! The graphics in Suspect in Sight are outstanding, with fun flying controls!" - slidetoplay.com "Featuring a handful of stylish environments, responsive tilt controls, and exciting gameplay, Suspect In Sight is an arresting challenge!" - appsmile.com "Jujubee set out to create a game with the feeling of a 1970's police drama, and they nailed it completely. (...) The graphics are stupendous, if not bit reminiscent of the Grand Theft Auto series, and the sounds are authentic and interesting!" - gamezebo.com -- Live the life of Rob, the ultimate badass police officer, who gets things done! Fly his police chopper and use its spotlight to catch criminals on the loose! Bring law and order back to three great American cities – Miami, New York and Los Angeles*! Unveil comic frames drawn by one of the world’s best comic artists and help Rob succeed in his quest to deliver justice! Highly detailed 3D graphics, great music and sounds, cool bonuses, unique and addicting gameplay, 3 cities to discover, trophies to collect, a bit of sarcastic humor and much more in this fast-paced adrenaline arcade masterpiece! Features and highlights: - 3 amazing cities to discover (Miami, New York, Los Angeles)! - 30 addicting and fun missions! - Cool music and real police sounds! - 4 police choppers to master! - Additional game modes to unlock! - Tasty and useful bonuses! - Precise and fun controls! - Full accelerometer support! - Hours of intense arcade action! - Gorgeous visual effects! - Superb comic story to unveil! - A bit of sarcastic humor! - And much more!

Znakomite Cytaty (Brilliant Quotes PL) to najbardziej zaawansowana a zarazem elegancka i przyjazna dla użytkowania aplikacją z cytatami na rynku. Została niedawno udoskonalona w nowoczesny interfejs bazując głównie na komentarzach użytkowników. Pobierz ją teraz i zwiększ wartość swojego telefonu bądź tabletu. Brilliant Quotes to aplikacja posiadająca zbiór ponad 2200 starannie dobranych cytatów należących do ponad 160 autorów. Posiada motywujące wypowiedzi filozofów, pisarzy, myślicieli duchowych i innych wielkich umysłów, których słowa zainspirowały wielu ludzi. Doświadczaj tego osobiście, pobierz teraz i bądź zainspirowany każdego dnia! Nowa wersja aplikacji posiada wiele ulepszeń. Elegancki i prostszy w użyciu interfejs użytkownika sprawiają, że odkrywanie nowych cytatów staje się bardziej przyjemne. Co więcej: - Bardzo konfigurowalny app-widget. Dodaj cytaty na ekran główny swojego telefonu, - Dwa motywy wyglądu: Ciemny i Jasny, - Przeglądaj cytaty według autorów i kategorii, - Codzienne powiadomienia o nowym cytacie dnia, - Krótkie informacje o autorach wraz z linkiem do bardziej dokładnych informacji na Wikipedii, - Top50 - zobacz jakie cytaty są najbardziej lubiane przez innych użytkowników, - Możliwość 'ukrywania' nielubianych autorów i kategorii za pomocą Filtrów, - Opcje wyszukiwania w/g autorów, cytatów, - I wiele, wiele więcej... Excellent Quotes (Brilliant Quotes PL) is the most advanced yet elegant and friendly to use application with quotes on the market. It has recently been enhanced with a modern interface based mainly on user comments. Download it now and increase the value of your phone or tablet. Brilliant Quotes is an application that holds a collection of over 2200 carefully selected quotations belonging to more than 160 authors. It has a motivational speech of philosophers, writers, thinkers, spiritual and other great minds whose words have inspired many people. Experience the it personally, download now and be inspired every day! New version has many improvements. Elegant and easier to use user interface make the discovery of new citations becomes more enjoyable. Furthermore: - Very customizable app-widget. Add quotes on the screen of your phone, - Two motifs appearance: Dark and Light, - Browse quotes by author and category, - Daily notifications of new quote of the day, - Brief information about the authors, along with a link to more detailed information on Wikipedia - Top50 - see what quotes are most liked by other users. - Ability to 'hide' disliked authors and categories using filters, - Search Options / g authors, quotes, - And much much more...
release_text: - Naprawiono problem powodujący pokazywanie myślników w środku słów - Drobne poprawki

description: Simple, minimal, and beautiful clock widget! Pixel-prefect! HUDclock features: - Black & white color customization for three widget areas: time, date and am/pm + year - Fully resizable (Android 4.1+) - Change font to your liking - Launch clock, alarm or any other app on tap - Lockscreen support (Android 4.2+) - Add shadow - Battery friendly! HUDclock uses WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE permission to change font. This is a port of YBoris's great rainmeter skin: http://yboris.deviantart.com/art/10-Foot-HUD-YBoris-edit-105201352 SEO: Clock Widget, Date, Minimal, Minimalistic, Clean, HUD, HUD clock, time, digital, retro
release_text: it is recommended to remove HUDclock 1.x widget before upgrading to version 2.0 Version 2.0 added: - choose color from black&white palette - change font - add shadow - lockscreen support - resizable - open any app on tap - multiple widget instances - design improvements - consume less battery

description: It's 1989 and it's the last day of communism! Launch intercontinental ballistic missiles and end the cold war! Rules: Before you begin the war arm your regions with silos. If you have enough points you can also add a new region. When the war is started you have ten seconds to prepare for battle. Select silo and then choose the target (enemy city or silo) to launch missiles. If you hit into Dead Hand launched enemy missiles will be neutralized. Silo operational characteristic: One MT (megaton) annihilates one mln citizens 5MT - five fast but small missiles, destroying 30% rockets after Dead hand hit 10MT - five medium missiles, destroying 60% rockets after Dead hand hit 15MT - five slow and powerful missiles, destroying 100% rockets after Dead hand hit Special units: Bomber - slow and small unit, can attack only cities, cannot be destroyed after Norad hit! Submarine - contains 5MT missiles. Submarines are invisible to opponent until they launch first missile. You have to 'buy' one of sea region to add submarines to your army. To win destory all enemy cities.
Free plasma live wallpaper. Please send any suggestions or bugs info. TO USE: Home->Press Menu->Wallpapers->Live Wallpapers and select 'Plasma Live Wallpaper'.

Oficjalna aplikacja prawdopodobnie najlepszej strony na świecie - odwiedzany przez miliony internautów serwis Joe Monster (www.joemonster.org) - wszystko co najciekawsze i najśmieszniejsze w internecie w zasięgu twojej ręki. Joe Monster - to humor dla młodych duchem, niekoniecznie wiekiem, którzy mają małą tolerancję na gimbazę, na przykład na serwisy obrazkowe typu Demotywatory, Besty, czy Kwejki. Joe na komórkę to klasyczne śmieszne obrazki z polskiego, rosyjskiego i angielskiego internetu (tu brak porno i erotyki), najnowsze filmy w Monster TV, oryginalne ciekawostki, także tworzone przez autorów piszących tylko dla nas. Można się logować do aplikacji i dzięki temu także umożliwiamy: - głosowanie na artykuły, obrazki i filmy - głosowanie na komentarze - możliwość komentowania - możliwość lajkowania materiałów z JM na Facebooku Potwornie przyjemnego korzystania! PS. Przypominamy, że nie ma czegoś takiego jak "dżoster", ani "joemonster", jest "Joe Monster" (czyt. Dżou Monste'", czyli swojski Józek Potwornicki. The official application probably the best side in the world - visited by millions of Internet service Joe Monster (www.joemonster.org) - all of which the most interesting and funniest on the Internet at your fingertips. Joe Monster - is humor for the young at heart, not necessarily age who have a low tolerance for gimbazę, for example, the type of services pictorial Demotywatory, Besty, or Kwejki. Joe cell is a classic funny pictures of Polish, Russian and English the Internet (a lack of porn and erotica), the latest movies in Monster TV, original trivia, also created by the writers just for us. You can log in to the application and thus also enable: - Vote on the articles, pictures and videos - Vote on comments - The possibility of commenting - The possibility of lajkowania materials from JM on Facebook Terribly pleasant to use! PS. We remind you that there is no such thing as "dżoster" nor "joemonster," is "Joe Monster" (pronounced. Dżou Monsta '', that is homey Joe Potwornicki.
release_text: Poprawiliśmy tak wiele błędów, że to praktycznie nowa aplikacja. Plus dorzuciliśmy Wam wyszukiwarkę!

description: A ruler is an instrument used in geometry, technical drawing and engineering to measure distances and to rule straight lines. You can switch between cm and inch.

NOTE: for the application, you need an account on the system MobiReg, obtained from a school that has implemented the MobiReg System Official app offers remote access to a parent account at mobireg.pl The main features of the application: - Download data from website mobireg.pl - Operate in off-line mode, with the possibility of on-demand synchronization - Review of the student's schedule - Review of the student's presence - Review of reviews along with information about the types of assessments - Support for multiple accounts (if you have a few pupils in different schools)
release_text: - poprawa wyświetlania wiadomości - na prośbę użytkowników dodano obramowanie nowych ocen - tryb demo dla użytkowników bez pakietu (dostępny plan lekcji) - przegląd wiadomości od nauczycieli oraz innych użytkowników systemu - usprawnienia wyglądu oraz wygody obsługi aplikacji

description: Elegant notepad application with nice animations and useful functions. Fast scrolling between notes, grouping notes in folders, notifications, to-do lists, delete multiple items at once, password protection, export/import, real time search function, 1x1 and 2x2 app widgets and many more! More features coming soon! Supported languages: English (default), Polish, French Ad free version. Check the regular version if you want to test the application first.

Connect the same color of power supply to bulbs and light them. Mix colors to match not standard bulbs. Just touch the wire and it will rotate. Only the best brains will finish this game and get all the stars! The gameplay is similar to plumber game.

Teraz w Nawigacji NaviExpert możesz podróżować z darmowym głosem Wiedźmina Geralta w prezencie od HTC i CD Projekt Red. Znajdziesz go w menu Narzędzia - Głosy. Nawigacja samochodowa NaviExpert, dzięki aktualizowanym na bieżąco mapom, zaprowadzi Cię zawsze do celu. Wyznaczanie trasy zajmuje chwilę, a dzięki zaawansowanym technologiom w trakcie jazdy ominiesz korki i unikniesz mandatu otrzymując ostrzeżenia CB o fotoradarach czy kontrolach policji, a także dowiesz się, jakie ograniczenia prędkości obowiązują na Twojej trasie. Wypróbuj aplikację przez 7 dni za darmo! Co wyróżnia Nawigację NaviExpert? • zaawansowane algorytmy omijające korki, dzięki którym zdobywasz czas, • porównanie tras alternatywnych na mapie, • planowanie tras wielopunktowych i możliwość optymalizacji kolejności odwiedzanych punktów, dzięki funkcji Komiwojażera, • darmowa mapa Polski, aktualizowana online o nowe inwestycje drogowe i remonty, • informacja o strefach i płacenie za parking w płatnej strefie parkowania, • ostrzeżenia CB zgłaszane przez użytkowników NaviExpert i Ryśka o fotoradarach, kontrolach policji, wypadkach czy niebezpiecznych miejscach, • informacja kto zgłosił ostrzeżenie CB, ile osób je potwierdziło i jakie jest ograniczenie prędkości • 5 godzin darmowego abonamentu za każdą godzinę przejechaną z włączoną aplikacją, • darmowa funkcja HUD, • bogata baza użytecznych miejsc - ponad 400 000 punktów POI, • tryb nawigacji pieszej i środkami komunikacji miejskiej, • mapa Europy, umożliwiająca nawigację po 30 krajach* Jak skorzystać? 1. Zainstaluj aplikację i przetestuj ją przez tydzień za darmo ciesząc się podróżowaniem po Polsce bez korków i mandatów. 2. Chcesz wykupić abonament? Wybierz jedną z dostępnych opcji: Usługi nawigacyjne dla Polski: - abonament 7 dni – 9,90zł - subskrypcja 1 miesiąc – 14,90zł - abonament 1 rok – 99zł Usługi nawigacyjne dla Polski i Europy* - subskrypcja 1 miesiąc – 24,99zł - abonament 12 miesięcy – 149zł Pamiętaj jednak, że nie mając aktywnego abonamentu nawigacyjnego, możesz nadal za darmo przeglądać mapę z danymi o ruchu drogowym, a także masz dostęp do ostrzeżeń CB, informacji o płatnych strefach parkowania i bazy użytecznych miejsc. 3. Podróżuj z NaviExpert i za każdą godzinę przejechaną z włączoną aplikacją odbieraj 5 dodatkowych godzin extra abonamentu w ramach programu „Przedłuż sobie”. Sprawdź szczegóły na http://bit.ly/PrzedluzSobieNE To co? W drogę! Ważne informacje: Płatności za parkingi Wjeżdżając do strefy parkowania na mapie pojawi się ikona płatnego parkingu. Po kliknięciu w nią NaviExpert wywoła aplikację SkyCash, przy użyciu której realizowana jest płatność. Jeśli nie masz jej jeszcze w swoim telefonie, pobierz ją z Google Play oraz zasil swoje konto SkyCash środkami. Pamiętaj! Płacąc za parking z NaviExpert, powinieneś oznaczyć swój samochód identyfikatorem z napisem: mobiParking. Możesz go pobrać stąd: http://skycash.com/files/identyfikatormobiparking.pdf lub po prostu napisać na kartce: mobiParking. Kartkę/naklejkę należy umieścić dolnym rogu przedniej szyby pojazdu. Dane o ruchu drogowym *Informacje o ruchu drogowym (traffic), remonty oraz ostrzeżenia CB m.in. o fotoradarach i kontrolach drogowych są wykorzystywane tylko podczas nawigowania na terenie Polski. Usługa dla Europy umożliwiająca nawigację po 30 krajach*: Austria, Belgia, Bułgaria, Chorwacja, Czechy, Dania, Estonia, Finlandia, Francja, Grecja, Hiszpania, Holandia, Irlandia, Łotwa, Liechtenstein, Litwa, Luksemburg, Niemcy, Norwegia, Portugalia, Rumunia, Słowacja, Słowenia, Szwajcaria, Szwecja, Turcja, Ukraina, Wielka Brytania, Węgry, Włochy. Now in NaviExpert you can travel with the free voice of the witcher Geralt as a gift from HTC and CD Projekt Red. You will find it in the Tools menu - Voices. NaviExpert car navigation through maps updated on a regular basis, always bring you to your destination. Routing takes a while, and thanks to advanced technologies while driving and avoid traffic jams omit the mandate of the CB to give warnings about speed cameras or police checks, and also find out what the speed limits on your route.   Try this App for 7 days for free!   What distinguishes Navigation NaviExpert? • advanced algorithms to bypass traffic jams, which increases your time, • comparison of alternative routes on the map. • multipoint route planning and the ability to optimize the order of visited points, thanks to the salesman, • Free map Polish, online updated with new investments in roads and repairs, • Information on zones and paying for parking in the paid parking zone. • CB warning reported by users NaviExpert and Rysiek about speed cameras, controls the police, accidents or dangerous places, • Information who reported a warning CB how many people they have confirmed and what is the speed limit • 5 hours of free subscription for every hour traveled with enabled application • Free function HUD • rich database of useful sites - over 400 000 points of interest, • pedestrian navigation mode and means of transport, • map of Europe, allowing navigation through 30 countries *   How to use it?   1. Install the application and test it for free for a week enjoying traveling around Poland without traffic jams and mandates. 2. Do you want to subscribe? Select one of the following options: Navigation services for Polish: - Subscription 7 days - 9,90zł - 1 month subscription - 14,90zł - Subscription 1 year - 99zł Navigation services for Polish and Europe * - 1 month subscription - 24,99zł - Subscription 12 months - 149zł   Remember, however, that without active navigation subscription, you can still free to browse the map with the data traffic, as well as have access to alerts CB information about paid parking zones and the base of Interest.   3. Travel with NaviExpert and for every hour traveled with enabled application receives 5 extra hours extra subscription under the "Extend yourself." Check the details on http://bit.ly/PrzedluzSobieNE   So what? Let's go!   Important information: Payments for parking Entering the parking zone on the map icon appears on paid parking. After clicking on it NaviExpert SkyCash cause the application using the payment is realized. If you do not have it yet on your phone, download it from Google Play, and Activate your account SkyCash means. Remember! Paying for parking with NaviExpert, you should mark your car identifier with the inscription: mobiParking. You can download it from here: http://skycash.com/files/identyfikatormobiparking.pdf or simply write on a sheet: mobiParking. Card / sticker should be placed lower corner of the windshield of the vehicle. Pack your luggage and take a trip to Barcelona with our new app Best Places in Barcelona! You can make your dream come true and visit the most beautiful city in Spain! Our app allows you to become a tourist and explore the city! Stroll down the streets of Barcelona and choose your favorite place. Best Places in Barcelona has outstanding photos of the most attractive spots. Nice and realistic sounds will please your journey! You can also read the most interesting facts about the given place. With Best Places in Barcelona your journey could be easy and enjoyable!

Best Ruler is a very useful tool! Best Ruler installed on your smartphone might be very helpful tool, when you can't reach a traditional ruler. This applications allows to measure any object without the need for using professional measuring instruments! How to use the application Best Ruler? The usage of this tool is quite simple: put an object on the screen, adjust it to the upper left corner and touch the screen – now you can read the length and width. Another advantage of Best Ruler is an easy interface and pleasing to the eye design. This utility has two kinds of very accurate scales in centimeters and inches, just select the appropriate option. Best Ruler also has two display modes of lines (horizontal and vertical), and arrows on either side of the screen allows to appropriately adjusting the length of the ruler. Don't hesitate and download Best Ruler tool, because you don't know when it can become useful!

Best Retro Sokoban (also known as Push Push)is a free version of classic computer puzzle game, in which the player pushes the boxes around the warehouse, trying to get them to the proper storage locations. Play 60 sokoban levels! The pixelated player cannot move outside the board, and he may only move horizontally or vertically onto empty squares, so never through walls or boxes. Boxes may not be pushed into other boxes or walls, and they cannot be pulled. The puzzle is solved and you win when all boxes are in their storage locations. Features: - contains 60 sokoban levels, all accessible for free (no need to pay any money), - different difficulties, - intuitive swipe controls (possibility to use keyboard keys to push box), - simple and clean interface free of unnecessary distractions, - all levels accessible from the beginning, - undo system to withdraw wrong moves, useful for sokoban newbies, - support for HD screens, - all levels are proved to be solvable. Try this arcade game!
release_text: Google Play Game Services added Bugfixes

description: We have prepared for you a special Best Sudoku with 5 difficulty levels! An intuitive interface will makes that the game will be a pleasure. This Sudoku app is sure to be your favorite! - 5 levels - easy, medium, hard, unfair, extreme hard - pencil marks with auto fill / erase, as specified in settings - auto-save - undo and redo - top scores and history - ranking list - it's handy to use both vertical and horizontal Rules: Fill in the grid so that every row, column and 3x3 box contains all digits from 1 to 9. Sudoku can be navigated by touch screen. If You want to erase number from cell, You simply click button "Writing/Erasing" and erase by click on cell. You can choose one from two options of filling grid: 1. Select number first, and then put it into cells. 2. Select cell first and then choose number to fill from dialog. You can choosing this option by clicking button "Cell/Number First". You can also undo and redo Your moves. If You want save Your game and return to them for some time, click Save. Saved game will be in "Saved games" in main menu. High scores may be viewing in Highscores in main menu. Let's play with us and have a lot of fun!

Big Pig game is a free fun physics puzzle game with an original idea and execution! Your task in Big Pig game is to build a construction, such a physics construction that could be resistant to the weight of a big falling ... pig. You have, at your disposal, a limited number of fun puzzle elements - boards, boxes, tires and any other items on hand. The items must be laid one on another ones to build the highest and most stable physics construction. The construction cannot be lower than the long rope suspended in the air. If you build a lower construction or a pig falls below the line, your task will not be completed. Big Pig game reviews: "Big Pig is crazy addictive and, just like Angry Birds, it’s easy to find yourself unshaven in your apartment wondering where the last two days of your life went. Love It!" - androidstatic.com "Amusing physics puzzle game" - slidetoplay.com Big Pig game coming to Android from iPhone. You have to pass 48 full of fun levels in two different worlds. So make the dreams of pigs come true and make them bigger! ps. Make it with fun!

Wood Blocks Puzzle for Kids is an application which makes it possible for you or your child to enjoy real fun and learn. This application involves arranging of colorful wooden puzzle blocks by your kids or toddlers. The faithfully recreated way of arranging blocks is so close to the reality that arranging blocks is very simple and intuitive. Additionally, you can lock the rotation of blocks and view a sample pattern for arrangement, making arrangement of blocks easier. Blocks for Kids includes 4 sets of blocks, which can be used to create a variety of buildings and constructions. Each set includes one sample model of building construction. There is no limitation as to the number of blocks because each block may be used many times! Arranged constructions are automatically saved in the gallery. You can go back to them later on, finish your project or completely rebuild your construction. This application uses the elements of physics – if you drop a block it falls down and stops on a different element. Blocks can be collected and moved. However, you need to remember that any construction may be damaged or even destroyed, as in real life. Holding a block by your finger, you can rotate it. If using this function is too difficult for you or your children, rotation of blocks can be permanently locked. Application features: - four sample sets of blocks - arrange blocks according with the principles of physics - you can use the same block several times - you can see a sample view of block arrangement - you can lock the function of rotation of blocks - the constructed sets are automatically saved in the gallery - edit the saved construction in the gallery - nice music and sound effects while using the app - kids-friendly interface

Burned Calories Counter application enables to calculate burned calories during doing exercises and varied activities. The application includes the base of several dozen activities and exercises within saved values of burned calories. After choosing any exercise, the application enables, owing to an in-built stop-watch, to measure the time of doing a particular activity and the amount of burned calories. The program gives the possibility to review burned calories graphs. You can select many exercises from database or edit your own. Burned Calories Counter will be useful for those, who want to lose their weight and want to have good looking, fit figure, for sportsmen and the ones who do not know about the influence of varied activities on burned calories. FEATURES - 30 ready exercises and activities for you - current,today and total time and calorie counters - monthly graphs with burned calories - possibility to share your activities on Facebook - nice and easy to use interface Included exercises and activities: Fast running, Playing golf, Playing tennis, Skiing, Windows cleaning, Swimming, Slow walking, Going upstairs, Wood chopping, Riding a bike, Slow running, Typing, Curtains hanging out, Riding a motorcycle, Driving a car, Rowing, Dishes washing up, Floor waxing, Running upstairs, Mountain trips, Painting, Basketball, Cooking, Ride a horse, Intensive dance, Soccer, Work in garden, March, Ping-pong, Volley-ball
release_text: - compatibility & interface improvements - additional help button

description: Shoot the Cans is an absorbing physics game that will allow you to take a break from daily routine and relax by throwing down beverage cans in a row. You can use many different types of objects such as various balls and all items at close hand to throw down the cans. You have three worlds to pass in different scenes, each containing 20 stages. The first world is the beach where you can aim at cans arranged on sand hills. As a kind of weapon you use different balls, or even ... coconuts :) Each next world is a new scenery, new weapons and additional surprises :) FEATURES: - 3 Worlds and 60 levels - 15 different weapons - nice graphics and music - physics game engine In Shoot the Cans you can throw anything at cans and have fun, as well as improve your precision and beat new records!

Take Care of one of the Funners and play funny jokes on other players! Funners is a world of funny creatures, for whom the most important thing is good fun and... playing funny jokes on other players! In the game you become a guardian of one of the Funners and his fate depends on you! To make the game more attractive you can advance to higher levels, where you will meet a fly, spider, mole, and you’ll even see.. a UFO! A sponge for cleaning will be necessary if someone plays a joke on you. You can also give a high-five to your virtual pet. You will be blowing up balloons, smash bubbles and lifting weights... If you feel like having a rest for a moment, you can play one of the several mini-games. Funners will be great game not only for kids but also gamers which love fun and cute games such as Tamagotchi or Pou and other games in which you can take care or hatch virtual pet, monster or a sweety creature. Game features: - taking care of a funny pet creature - interactive fun, mini-games and sports - playing funny jokes on other players! - achieving new levels - interaction with the environment - actual time lapse - shop with clothes, accessories, food, etc. - game for everybody, not only for kids ;) - collecting coins - playing mini-games - Google Play Game Services rankings and achievements Lots of fun is guaranteed!
release_text: - spring background - new Funners moves - few game improvements

description: Glow Paint is an application simulating glow or neon painting on the touch screen of your mobile phone. Glow Paint allows you to select one of 12 colors of paints, three glow sizes, five brush types and several background patterns or templates, Undo or Redo the last brush movement. You can also save your created image as a file, set as wallpaper or share image with your friends. With Glow Paint you can draw nice neon or LED doodles or add neon glows to your images or photos from phone gallery. Enjoy! Glow Paint Main Features: - 12 glow colours - 3 glow sizes and strength - 5 glow brushes - 5 backgrounds patterns - 25 templates - undo/redo - eraser - saving created image as a file, set as wallpaper or share with friends - draw on images or photos selected from phone gallery
release_text: - new templates - interface improvements - compatibility improvements - bugfixes

description: Jet Space is a shoot'em up game based on an old and best shoot'em up games with many new ideas! Year 2560, the enemy planet Qubus-5. You are the pilot-in-command of Venom-X spacecraft. What you need to do to complete the mission is to reach out to the core of the other planet Qubus-5. The secret reports say that the interior of the planet is the environment of underground caves, protected against the attack of alien civilizations. Your spacecraft is equipped with weapons, by means of which you can carry out massive attack. Any destruction of the enemy unit will be rewarded. As a result, you will be able to enhance your spacecraft. Good Luck! Jet Space is a retro mix of best features from such games as River Raid (look on fuel barrels), Scramble (cave terrain, bombs) or R-Type (gameplay) with easy control system (drag and fire). Jet Space game will be very playable for all oldskool and modern game fans. Game Features: - dynamic action and intuitive control - combination of the elements of old shoot'em up games with many new ideas - addictive endless gameplay - beating top and daily records - achievements and leaderboards - game missions system - in game shop with additional equipment - inventory shop - detailed game stats
release_text: - fixed collision with walls - compatybility improvements

description: Numgo is an addictive free number puzzle match game in which your task is to remove the same numbers and get as many points as possible. The game is a mix of three match blocks free puzzle games with combinations of the numbers. This game is a little different than many 2048 numbers type games. You get points according to removed number quantity and value. You can move numbers horizontally to connect the same numbers in large groups. Every ten removals lowest numbers will be changed to higher values. When all numbers blocks will be disconnected, your game will over... Good luck! Game features: - ten values to achieve - beat daily and best records - on-line leaderboards - simple and addictive gameplay - good sound effects and graphics Numgo game is not a next 2048 or Threes number game but is a very playable mix of three match blocks puzzle type games with combinations of the number values.
release_text: - new sound effects - other changes & bugfixes

description: A fantastic mix of colors, sparkles and lights directly from your mobile phone! Party Lights will change the screen of your Android phone into a disco show according to currently listened music sounds. You will be able to choose one of twelve available effects – a stroboscope, pixel plasma, stars, rays, spiral and others nice visual effects. You can enable color-mixing effect or set manually effect colours. Each effect speed may be additionally regulated - based on beats per minute (BPM Mode), based on music sound level (Tune Mode) or manually by touching the screen (Tap Mode). If you happen to be in darkness, your way will be lightened up by beautiful effects. A real disco show with your mobile phone! Note: This app in the TUNE MODE use your device microphone to analize sound level to invoke effects bump according to the tempo of listening music or any another sound. This is especially useful when you are on a party or a live concert where your phone can show effects according to music rhytm live beats. Happy Newy Year party with Party Lights!

Scamps game is an addictive free physics puzzle game with funny colorful furry bubble ball creatures which you will love! The Scamps free puzzle game offers five different game modes: ★COLOR CLEAR★ Remove scamps of same colours by touching the scamp who touches at least one scamp of the same color. The more scamps you remove in one go, the more points you get! Remove completely scamps of the same colour to get Color-Clear Bonus Combo! Do not let scamps occupy the entire screen. With time you will see scamps in additional colours. ★90 SECONDS★ The 90 seconds mode is a mode in which you have 90 seconds to play the game. Your playing time may be extended when you completely remove scamps of the same colour. ★MORE COLORS★ In this mode, you will see scamps in other colours and colorful scamps, so the game will be much more interesting! ★EXTREME★ Here, you remove scamps provided that there are at least three scamps of the same color next to each other. ★TIME ATTACK★ Time Attack is an uncontrollable attack of scamps. No matter how you remove scamps, you will have other groups of scamps falling suddenly. Individual Scamps characters You can enable or disable up to four individual Scamps characters which make your game much more interesting: - DARK – touch a scamp to remove him, be careful because dark scamps can beat their neighbours! - CHIMNEY SWEEP - a seemingly harmless scamp but he can send neighbouring scamps to other planet. Just touch the scamp. - COLORFUL – this scamp does not care who his neighbour is. You cannot touch him but he is willing to go with his neighbors. Game features: - Addictive physics free puzzle game - Several types and colours of funny scamps - Individual features of Scamps - Five game modes - Additional Bonus Game - "Who is next?" - Funny and realistic Scamps sound effects and animations - The use of the elements of physics - Great playability The Scamps game is a variety of classic connect games which, by combining elements of physics as well as funny scamps, will give you a lot of time of great and light entertainment!
release_text: - HD graphics - new icon - bugfixes and other improvements

description: Scamps inhabit one of the distant planets. They are nice and hairy creatures you will like. Unfortunately scamps have one problem - their planet is under snow attack! Help scamps and send them back to other, neighboring planet! Game Rules Remove scamps of same colours by touching the scamp who touches at least one scamp of the same color. The more scamps you remove in one go, the more points you get! Remove completely scamps of the same (one) colour to get Color Clear Combo Bonus! Do not let scamps occupy the entire screen. With time you will see scamps in additional colours. In the game you will meet individual Snow Scamp character – touch him to remove, be careful because snow scamps can beat their neighbours! Merry Christmas and Happy New Year!

Panorama Firm Nawigacja to aplikacja bezpłatna, działająca w trybie offline i zintegrowana z mobilną aplikacją Panoramy Firm - trzy bardzo dobre powody, żeby mieć Nawigację zawsze pod ręką. Aplikacja posiada wszystkie funkcje, których można oczekiwać od mobilnej nawigacji GPS. Dodatkowo korzysta z technologii TomTom. Aplikacja działa zarówno na smartfonie, jak i na tablecie. Pobierz aplikację, a znajdziesz drogę w każdej sytuacji, niezależnie od tego, czy przebijasz się przez zakorkowane centrum miasta, czy też jedziesz odwiedzić wujka, mieszkającego głęboko w lesie. Włączony GPS w tle może znacząco zwiększyć zużycie baterii. Najważniejsze cechy aplikacji: - samochodowa nawigacja GPS - bezpłatna i działa bez dostępu do Internetu - bardzo dobre mapy TomTom - prowadzi do dowolnego miejsca w Polsce - wyznacza trasę do każdej firmy w mobilnej Panoramie Firm - budynki 3D - polski lektor Aplikacja działa na systemie Android 2.2 i nowszych (minimalna szybkość CPU to 600 Mhz) - zalecamy co najmniej 200 MB wolnego miejsca pamięci wewnętrznej. Nawigacja jest dość sporych rozmiarów, warto zatem pobrać ją, łącząc się z Wi-Fi. Panorama Firm Navigation is a free application, running in offline and integrated mobile application Panorama Firm - three very good reasons to have a Navigation always at hand. The application has all the features you would expect from a mobile GPS navigation. In addition, TomTom uses. The application works on both smartphone and tablet. Download the app, and find your way in any situation, regardless of whether they raise through the congested city center, or you're going to visit an uncle who lived deep in the forest. On the GPS in the background can dramatically increase battery consumption. Key features of the application: - Car GPS Navigation - Free and works without access to the Internet - Very good maps TomTom - Leads to anywhere in Poland - Sets a route to any company in the mobile Panorama Firm - 3D buildings - Polish teacher The app works on Android 2.2 and higher (minimum CPU speed is 600 MHz) - we recommend at least 200 MB of free internal memory. Navigation is quite sizable, it is therefore download it by connecting to a Wi-Fi network.
release_text: Wprowadziliśmy kilka usprawnień: - Dzielenie się informacjami na temat czasu przyjazdu z rodziną i przyjaciółmi, poprzez SMS, e-mail, Twitter i inne aplikacje, bezpośrednio z Menu Głównego. - Aktualizacja mapy Polski: skorzystaj z mapy w najnowszej dostępnej wersji, z jeszcze większym pokryciem sieci drogowej! - Aktualizacja map Europy! Pamiętaj, że zawsze możesz przywrócić swoje poprzednie zakupy, nawet jeśli zmieniłeś telefon. Wystarczy przejść do Menu Głównego-> Ja -> Przywróć.

description: Turkish English / English Turkish Translator and Dictionary Türkçe İngilizce / İngilizce Türkçe Çevirmenler ve Sözlük Features * Simple and intuitive interface * Translates sentences and words * Reads loudly after translation * Voice recognition * send as SMS or email (tab on translation to active it) Interent access is required. Please email me if you want to add any features or if you find something which doesn't work.
release_text: - added support for sharing translations via email, sms, facebook, twitter. Tab on translation to show share popup dialog. - fixed problems with random numbers showing up instead of translations

description: PUPIL MARKS is a program, which should have every pupil. How often did you forget your marks, average or your homeworks or even date of your exams? The program help you in: - subjects - marks - homeworks - exams - notes ...

Jump Jump!!! “Fat jump” is coming with more updated levels! Jump as high as possible, what are you waiting for? To use the gravity sensor is to tilt your Android machine to the left and right, remember to touch the screen when you want to beat the “monsters”. If you enjoy other tilt, jump and fly games, you must LOVE Fat Jump, the best part is that it is FREE with more levels. Game Features： ★Exciting casual game mode ★Vivid and various graphics, sounds and music ★Super cool G-Sensor and free control ★Full of joy and highly easy addicted! Great fun to play with friends and family! Who can jump the highest in Fat Jump?

Official Meet Magento application: Meet Magento Italy 2016 Meet Magento Argentina 2015 Meet Magento Spain 2015 Meet Magento NY 2015 Meet Magento Netherlands 2015 Meet Magento Germany 2015 Meet Magento Italy 2015 Meet Magento Poland 2014 Meet Magento Switzerland 2014 Meet Magento Brazil 2014 Meet Magento New York 2014 Meet Magento Romania 2014 Meet Magento Ukraine 2014 Meet Magento Italy 2014 Meet Magento Netherlands 2014 Meet Magento Deutschland 2014 Meet Magento Spain 2014 Meet Magento Poland 2013 Meet Magento Brasil 2013 This app is developed by Snowdog to improve Meet Magento conferences. The intuitive interface makes it easy to use and organise your conference plan. Our app gives you access to agenda, current information about presentations and speakers. You can choose only that events which interest you and add them to your plan divided by days. Application supports SENSORO iBeacons - it's a perfect tool to enhance conference experience and engage most of attendees. Fun and valuable content for users, tons of useful statistics data for event organizer. Sponsor stands and smart agenda powered by SENSORO iBeacons make application location-context aware to provide attendees with the most suitable information. Attendees may give the feedback on quality of presentations using rating and review feature. Twitter feed lets you stay up to date and ask speaker a question. You can exchange your contact information with other participants of the conference using built-in QR code scanner. Your QR Code will be generated using the data that you can enter in the User Profile section. Application also provides information about location and sponsors of the conference and allows you to sign up for the conference or visit Meet Magento website. Thank you for using our app. If you organise Meet Magento or other conference please contact us! Enjoy!
release_text: 1.41 - added new SENSORO beacons support 1.4 - Added SENSORO beacons support - small bugfixes 1.35 - bugfix 1.34 - added Current Conference notification dialog 1.33 - added Material Design features - added Italian language - fixed small bugs 1.21 - problem with Lollipop fixed 1.2 - bugfixing 1.1 - added iBeacon support - added Tracks filter - added Sponsor Stands - removed unnecessary permissions

description: No time? Need fast and perfectly tie a tie? This app is just for you :) In six easy steps without a problem set up the tie, in any place.

Supper battery widget for you :) Gasoline meter widget shows the current status of your battery :) When your phone's battery level decreases gasoline varies. Low power consumption!! This widget is for people who like cars, speed, and want to enjoy life :) Clicking on it you can quickly configure the settings of your phone BT, WiFi and more

Wybierasz się w góry? Wejdź do największej mobilnej wyszukiwarki szlaków górskich w Polsce! Dołącz do górskich pasjonatów, odkrywaj szlaki, dziel się swoimi trasami, opiniami i zdjęciami - wspólnie twórzmy kompletną i użyteczną bazę szlaków górskich. „Szlaki w górach” to aplikacja, która powstała dzięki współpracy Żywiec Zdrój, Trail.pl oraz samych Użytkowników. Aplikacja ta pozwala wyszukiwać i przeglądać szlaki turystyczne oraz polecane przez innych wycieczki. Każda trasa opisana jest pod kątem długości i przebiegu szlaku na mapie oraz dopuszczalnych aktywności, np. „pieszo”, „rower” czy „obserwacja ptaków”. Aplikacja umożliwia też nawigację po wybranym szlaku, w trakcie wycieczki, przy użyciu jednej z kilku dostępnych map. Dzięki aplikacji „Szlaki w górach” można zapisywać swoje trasy i dzielić się nimi z innymi miłośnikami gór. Funkcje aplikacji 1. Wyszukiwanie szlaków w górach na terenie Polski: ● wyszukiwanie szlaków wg miejscowości i regionów w polskich górach; ● wyszukiwanie szlaków po nazwie szlaku; ● wyszukiwanie szlaków po aktywnościach dostępnych na szlaku; ● Podpowiedzi przy wyszukiwaniu po miejscowościach ; ● Wyszukiwanie po kliknięciu palcem na mapie. 2. Przeglądanie szlaków polecanych przez Żywiec Zdrój i Trail.pl: ● Przeglądanie wybranego szlaku, jego mapy, opisu i zdjęć (jeśli są dostępne); ● Powiększanie mapy z wybranym szlakiem na cały ekran urządzenia; ● Poruszanie się po wybranych szlakach w oparciu o GPS i transmisję danych z sieci komórkowej; ● Dodawanie szlaków do ulubionych(tylko dla zalogowanych użytkowników); ● Komentowanie szlaków wraz z dodawaniem zdjęć (tylko dla zalogowanych użytkowników); ● Możliwość meldunku na szlaku (tylko dla zalogowanych użytkowników); ● Współrzędne startu szlaku. 3. Możliwość wyboru jednego z 3 rodzajów map: ● Szlaki TRAIL; ● Szlaki TRAIL Mobile; ● UMP WAW. 4. Opcje widoku mapy: ● "pokaż szlak" – mapa centruje się na wyszukiwany lub sugerowanych szlakach; ● "pokaż mnie i szlak" – na mapie widoczna jest lokalizacja użytkownika w stosunku do wyszukiwanych lub sugerowanych szlaków; ● „pokaż moją lokalizację” – mapa pokazuje lokalizację użytkownika. 5. Nieograniczone nagrywanie, zapisywanie i opisywanie własnych tras: ● możliwość nagrywania trasy podczas korzystania z innych funkcji telefonu, tzw. nagrywanie w tle ● podgląd czasu, aktualnej i średniej prędkości, dystansu, pokonanej oraz aktualnej wysokości; ● zapisywanie nagranych tras jako prywatne; ● możliwość anulowania nagrywania trasy. 6. Możliwość korzystania z elektronicznego kompasu (ustawienie geograficznego oraz magnetycznego bieguna północnego). 7. Korzystanie z aplikacji bez logowania, z możliwością zapisywania własnych tras offline w pamięci urządzenia, (ale bez możliwości ich zapisywania on­line). 8. Logowanie się do aplikacji poprzez konto na Facebooku i zapisywanie własnych tras on­line w serwisie Trail.pl. 9. Dodanie zakładki aktualności (aktywności użytkowników aplikacji i serwisu TRAIL.PL). Uwagi Korzystając z aplikacji należy pamiętać, że jej działanie jest zależne od: ● jakości sygnału GPS, ● dostępności i siły sygnału sieci komórkowej, ● sprawności urządzenia Aplikacja może uzupełniać profesjonalne urządzenia GPS, ale nie może ich zastępować. Aplikacja korzysta z bazy szlaków tworzonej przez profesjonalistów i użytkowników ­ górskich pasjonatów. Pamiętaj, że zawarte w niej informacje nie muszą odpowiadać aktualnemu stanowi szlaków, dlatego zawsze sprawdzaj warunki terenowe i pogodowe bezpośrednio przed wyruszeniem na wycieczkę. Korzystanie z aplikacji GPS, działających w tle, może znacznie zmniejszyć żywotność baterii. Na szybsze zużycie akumulatorów w smartfonie wpływają przede wszystkim stale uruchomione funkcje nagrywania w tle, GPS i włączony wyświetlacz. Going to the mountains? Access to the largest mobile search engine mountain trails in Poland! Join mountain enthusiasts, explore trails, share your routes, opinions and photos - Let's create together a complete and useful set of mountain trails. "Trails in the Mountains" is an application that is a collaboration of Zywiec Zdroj, Trail.pl and the same users. This application lets you search and browse hiking trails and recommended by other tours. Each route is described in terms of the length and course of the route on the map and permitted activities such as "walking", "bike" or "bird watching". The application also allows you to navigate the selected route, during the trip, using one of several available maps. With this application, "Trails in the Mountains", you can save your routes and share them with other fans of the mountains. App Features 1 Search trails in the mountains in Polish: ● Search routes by cities and regions in the Polish mountains; ● Search trails by name the trail; ● search paths cross the activities available on the trail; ● Tips on finding po towns; ● Search by clicking on the map with your finger. 2 Przeglądanie routes recommended by Zywiec Zdroj and Trail.pl: ● To view the selected route, the map, description and picture (if available); ● Zooming map with the selected route on the screen of the device; ● Navigating the selected routes based on GPS and data from the cellular network; ● Adding trails to favorites (only for registered users); ● Comment on trails with the addition of pictures (only for registered users); ● Can check in on the trail (only for registered users); ● Coordinates off the trail. 3 The choice of one of three types of maps: ● Hiking Trail; ● Hiking Trail Mobile; ● UMP WAW. 4 Map display options: ● the "show route" - map centered on the search or suggested routes; ● the "show me and the trail" - the map shows the location of the user in relation to the search or suggested routes; ● the "show my location" - the map shows the location of the user. 5 Unlimited recording, storing and describing their routes: ● the ability to record routes while using other phone functions, so-called. background recording ● preview time, current and average speed, distance traveled and the actual amount; ● save the recorded tracks as private; ● the option to cancel the recording path. 6 The ability to use electronic compass (the geographic and magnetic North). 7 Using without logging in, the ability to save your own tracks online in memory (but without the possibility of their online store). 8 Log in to the application through a Facebook account and save your own tracks online at Trail.pl. 9 Add a bookmark news (user activity and service applications TRAIL.PL). Comments Using an application, please note that the effect is dependent on: ● quality of the GPS signal, ● availability and signal strength of the cellular network, ● availability of the device The application can complement professional GPS device, but can not replace them. The application uses the base paths created by professionals and users pasjonatów mountain. Please note that the information contained herein do not necessarily correspond with the current state routes, so always check the terrain and weather conditions immediately before embarking on a trip. Using GPS running in the background can dramatically decrease battery life. The faster your smartphone battery usage is primarily affected by the recording functions run continuously in the background, GPS and enabled display.

description: Very simple Android application for babies/children. Use finger to draw pictures, [MENU] or long press to pick a color [BACK] to clear the surface (or multiple times to change background) [Volume Down] to save current picture in Pictures directory [Volume Up] to share current picture via MMS, E-Mail, Facebook, ... No Ads - enjoy! If you like it please rate. Sources are available here: https://bitbucket.org/trpaslik/babydraw/src Feel free to suggest any enhancements. Cheers!

description: Zobacz najważniejsze i najświeższe informacje z kraju i ze świata, które przygotowuje najlepszy zespół reporterski w kraju. Pobierz aplikację na swój telefon, dzięki której będziesz mógł oglądać „Fakty” w każdym miejscu i o dowolnej porze. Zobaczysz również ekskluzywne materiały dostępne tylko w internecie, przeczytasz unikatowe opinie prowadzących i reporterów na temat aktualnych wydarzeń, a także obejrzysz ciekawe rozmowy z „Faktów po Faktach”. Dzięki aplikacji będziesz mógł komentować i dzielić się interesującymi faktami z innymi. “Fakty” - Poland's leading prime-time evening newscast. The most important news stories from Poland and around the world brought to you daily by country's top journalists. Get informed and stay on the news anytime and anywhere. Download our application to watch full episodes of our program, read our columns, see exclusive videos and interesting interviews from “Fakty po Faktach” See the most important and latest information from the country and the world, which prepares the best team of reporters in the country. Download the application to your phone through which you can watch the "facts" in any place and any time. You'll also see exclusive material available only on the Internet, read the opinions of leading and unique reporters about current events, as well as look interesting conversations with "Facts on the Special Issues." With this application you will be able to comment and share interesting facts with others. "Facts" - Poland's leading prime-time evening Newscast. The most important news stories from Poland and around the world brought to you daily by the country's top journalists. Get informed and stay on the news anytime and anywhere. Download our application to watch full episodes of our program, read our columns, see exclusive videos and interesting interviews from "Facts on the Special Issues"

Oglądaj TVN24 na żywo na ekranie swojego telefonu! Aplikacja TVN24 umożliwia szybkie i wygodne przeglądanie aktualnych informacji z portalu informacyjnego tvn24.pl, a także oglądanie na żywo telewizji TVN24. Aby uruchomić transmisję na żywo wystarczy posiadać wykupiony abonament na usługę i zalogować się w aplikacji. Dzięki aplikacji w przejrzysty sposób można także przeglądać wszystkie informacje z serwisu tvn24.pl, podzielne na kategorie m.in. Polska, Świat, Sport, Biznes, Kultura oraz oglądać wideo (na przykład „Kropkę nad i” czy „Fakty po Faktach”) i foto. Artykułami można podzielić się w serwisach społecznościowych lub wysłać e-mailem. Watch TVN 24 live on the screen of your phone! TVN24 application allows quick and convenient way to view current information from an information portal tvn24.pl, as well as watching live television TVN 24. To start the live broadcast enough to have subscribed to the service and log in to the application. With applications in a transparent manner, you can also view all the details of the service tvn24.pl, split into categories, among others, Poland, World, Sports, Business, Culture, and watch the video (for example, "Dot the I" or "facts on the Special Issues") and photo. Articles can be shared on social networks or send an e-mail.

Darmowa aplikacja pogodowa TVN Meteo na system Android dostarcza dane pogodowe z 80 000 miejscowości w Polsce i na świecie. Posiada wiele przydatnych funkcji - umożliwia m.in. zdefiniowanie listy miejscowości, dla której chcemy otrzymywać bieżące informacje o pogodzie. Informuje m.in. o temperaturze odczuwalnej, zachmurzeniu i opadach, sile, kierunkach i prędkości wiatru oraz ciśnieniu. Aplikacja łączy się z internetem i aktualizuje dane co godzinę. Oprócz aktualnych warunków, możesz również sprawdzić prognozę na najbliższe 24 godziny oraz prognozę długoterminową – na najbliższe 15 dni. Jeśli wyrazisz chęć, aplikacja automatycznie sprawdzi Twoją lokalizację oraz pokaże bieżące warunki pogodowe. Możliwości wyboru i wyszukiwania w Twoim telefonie są identyczne, jak w portalu pogodowym tvnmeteo.pl. TVN Meteo – Pogoda dla Ciebie. Zapoznaj się z polityką prywatności: http://tvnmeteo.tvn24.pl/polityka-prywatnosci,5.htm Free application TVN Meteo Weather for Android provides weather data from 80 000 cities in Poland and in the world. It has many useful functions - to include define a list of cities for which we receive information about the weather. Tells including the wind chill temperature, cloud cover and precipitation, strength, direction and wind speed and pressure. The application connects to the Internet and updates the data every hour. In addition to current conditions, you can also check the weather for the next 24 hours and forecast long-term - for the next 15 days. If you say that you want, the application automatically checks your location and show the current weather conditions. Choice and search for your phone are the same as in the portal tvnmeteo.pl weather. TVN Meteo - Weather for you. Read the privacy policy: http://tvnmeteo.tvn24.pl/polityka-prywatnosci , 5.htm

description: Very simple and easy in use stopwatch with big font. Stopwatch can measure time up to 100 hours. Very simple in use, you can touch, hit anywhere to start or pause measuring the time. So you don't need to look at the screen when you measure something. When you hold longer the stopwatch will restart. Stopwatch remembers its state even when the application is not working so you don't worry about measuring when somebody is calling to you. This stopwatch don't block call and other application, games. You can write sms, e-mail or do something else with your phone. Our stopwatch don't interrupt the measuring after rebooting the device. If you don't like ad, please look for pay version. Keywords: stopwatch, timer, full screen, easy, permanent.

Um dos aplicativos de negócios mais vendidos na versão em inglês, agora em português!! Carregue um Coach da Dale Carnegie no seu bolso para lhe ajudar a engajar-se com clientes, seus pares e gerencia a qualquer hora em qualquer lugar. Precisa motivar sua equipe - Clique em "Seja um Líder" e veja como os profissionais fazem. Tem conflitos no departamento - Clique em "Conseguir Cooperação" para ver a maneira certa para conseguir que todos remem na mesma direção. Precisa fortalecer relacionamentos – assista a maneira errada e depois a maneira certa de construir confiança. Segredos de Sucesso irá se tornar o seu coach de bolso indispensável toda vez que se deparar com uma dessas difíceis “situações com pessoas”.  Recursos: - 30 vídeos para lhe mostrar como se comportar em cada situação - Os Princípios de Preocupações comprovados que ajudam a gerenciar e superar situações de estresse - Dicas Valiosas em como motivar e engajar você mesmo e a sua equipe - Dose Diária de Confiança—receba uma dica diária que irá lhe manter positivo e entusiástico. One of the best-selling business applications in the English version, now in Portuguese! Carry a Carnegie Coach in your pocket to help you engage with customers, peers and management anytime, anywhere. Need to motivate your team - click on "Be A Leader" and see how the pros do. Have conflicts in the department - click on "Gain Cooperation" to see the right way to get everyone rowing in the same direction. Need to strengthen relationships - watch the wrong way and then the right way to build trust. Secrets of Success will become your indispensible pocket coach every time you face one of those tough "people."  Resources: - 30 videos to show you how to behave in every situation - The time tested Worry Principles that help manage and overcome stressful situations - Valuable Tips on how to motivate and engage yourself and your team - Daily Dose of Confidence-receives a daily tip that will keep you feeling positive and enthusiastic.

description: Da oggi se sei titolare di Postepay Evolution, la carta prepagata nominativa, ricaricabile e con codice IBAN, hai a disposizione nuove funzionalità dell’app a te dedicate! Puoi effettuare Miniricariche verso altre Postepay senza pagare costi di commissione entro i limiti giornalieri di ricarica previsti o disporre Bonifici dalla tua carta verso altri conti correnti e Postagiro verso conti correnti Poste Italiane. Inoltre, per tutti i possessori di Postepay, possibilità di salvare le operazioni più frequenti tra le Operazioni veloci, per richiamarle e finalizzarle in pochissimi passi! ************************** Postepay è l’applicazione ufficiale di Poste Italiane dedicata ai servizi in mobilità per la tua carta Postepay. Visualizza il saldo e i movimenti della tua Postepay, ricarica la tua carta o quella di un amico o ricarica una sim telefonica richiamando il numero dalla tua rubrica del telefono.  Se sei titolare di una Postepay Evolution accedi alle funzionalità a te riservate di Miniricarica, Bonifico e Postagiro. Puoi inoltre salvare le tue operazioni più frequenti grazie alla nuova funzionalità "operazioni veloci". Attiva il Sistema di sicurezza PosteID e autorizza le operazioni dispositive da app con il solo inserimento del codice PosteID scelto da te (maggiori info su www.poste.it/app). Con l’app Postepay puoi anche attivare gratuitamente una e-Postepay, la carta prepagata virtuale e ricevere via sms i suoi codici di utilizzo. La rubrica ti consente di memorizzare le carte che ricarichi più spesso e puoi assegnare un nome alle tue carte Postepay per riconoscerle meglio in fase di pagamento. Ricerca gli uffici postali e gli ATM Postamat dove ricaricare la tua carta Postepay. Puoi visualizzarli su lista o su mappa e ottenere le informazioni principali: indirizzo, orari di apertura, numeri di telefono.  Per accedere ai servizi informativi e dispositivi devi essere registrato al sito poste.it. Se ancora non lo sei, puoi farlo dall’area di login dell’app. La registrazione tramite app è consentita solo ai cittadini italiani maggiorenni e con domicilio in Italia. Per gli altri clienti la registrazione deve essere effettuata su poste.it. From today, if you hold Postepay Evolution, the prepaid card, rechargeable and with IBAN, you have a new feature of the app dedicated to you! You can make Miniricariche to other Postepay without paying commission costs within the limits provided daily recharge or dispose Transfer from your card to other bank accounts and giro accounts to the Italian Post. In addition, all holders of Postepay, ability to save frequently used operations between the Getting fast for recall and finish it in a few steps! ************************** Postepay is the official app of the Italian Post Office dedicated to mobile services for your Postepay card. View balance and transactions of your Postepay, recharge your card or that of a friend or a recharge sim phone by calling the number from your phone book. If you hold a sign Postepay Evolution of the features reserved for you Miniricarica, Bank and giro. You can also save your frequent tasks thanks to the new "fast operations." Activates the security system PosteID and authorizes the transaction instructions from the only app with passcode PosteID chosen by you (more info on www.poste.it/app). With the app Postepay can activate a free e-Postepay prepaid virtual card and receive sms via its codes of Use. The phonebook allows you to memorize the cards that charged more often, and you can assign a name to your Postepay card to recognize them better in the payment phase. Search post offices and ATM Postamat to recharge your Postepay card. You can view them on the list or on the map and get the basic information: address, opening hours, phone numbers. To access the information services and devices must be registered with the site poste.it. If still you are not, you can do so from the login app. The app is only allowed via registration to Italian citizens older and resident in Italy. For other customers, the registration must be made on poste.it.

description: Some people dedicate a few minutes each day to pray or give thanks for something or someone. Pray and give thanks is an application that helps you find prayer or petition to fit every occasion. It may be helpful for everyone: from believers to pray to their god, to a virgin or saint, to unbelievers who need to give thanks or pray for a specific reason, such as by what they have or how fortunate they are. Christians, Catholics, Protestants, etc... are welcome with special section to pray the Hail Mary, Lord’s prayer and Creed. Features: - 4 different themes: family and friends, personal, health and job and study - Each phrase is available to pray or give thanks - More than 50 sentences in total to choose - My own prayer: You can enter up to 10 sentences, save them and use them to pray or give thanks every time you want - Hail Mary, Lord’s prayer and Creed: 3 of the most important Christian prayer and include the ability to read them in Latin - Available for phones and tablets - Spanish and English languages Pray and give thanks may be the best partner in your moments of prayer.

description: The traditional style memory game matching pairs is sometimes not enough to develop the mind, so Memory 2 3 4 match up! has been developed with many options to memorize the pairs, find three same images, guess 4 of a kind or match correctly all the cards. It's a game of cards or chips in the form of pictures, fun and very easy to play, whose style is like a jigsaw or puzzle. In this puzzle game, you have to discover and remember images to exercise your memory; each game is a good test for your brain that will help you to get a good memory. No matter how old you are, only to have free time and desire to play. Doctors around the world recommend healthy and balanced diet, do some exercise daily and memory exercise. Couples = the traditional memory game to match two same pictures Threesomes = added difficulty to build your memory where you have to get 3 identical images Quartets = Check if you have an excellent memory trying to find 4 same photos All face up = in this game mode you can rest your mind because you can see the images all the time. Yes, you have to use your visual speed and reflexes to pair, make trios or make quartets in the shortest possible time. FEATURES: - 4 game modes: pairs, trios, quartets and all face up - 6 different sizes to choose from - 6 different themes: flags, alphabet letters, numbers, web icons, the couple and balloons - 1 player or challenge friends and family in 2 players mode - It saves the record of attempts and the time record in single player, in every size and theme - The only memory game designed in ladscape - Happy and fun music in and out of the game - The music is different if you set a new record or not - Share your records and memory at social networks, chat rooms, email, etc ... - Spanish and English languages
release_text: Memory 2 3 4 match up! 1.02: - New button Like in facebook - New button added in record screen - Some error fixed - Some visual changes

description: This tool is used for simultaneously playing of multiple audio files. You can assign any audio to any of 6x3 buttons by long tapping to it (you can switch screens by sliding them with finger, there are total of 3 views). By tapping on the button assigned file will be played or stopped depending on its current state. Also, buttons color reflect how long time has left to the end of file: green - more then 10 seconds to the end, yellow - more then 5 seconds, red - less then 5 seconds to the end. To clear all assigns, press the Option key on device and select "Clear All".
