description: === Device Compatibility === There is a huge range of Android tablets and as they are all slightly different, we cannot guarantee the app will perform as expected on devices not listed. Fully supported on the following Android devices: - Samsung Galaxy Tab 4 - Tesco Hudle 2 == Empowering the Vulnerable == "Life changing may sound extreme when talking about an app but for us it really is! My daughter struggles with the world understanding her, with this app she has a voice in society. MyChoicePad really has opened up a whole new world in terms of freedom, independence and choice." Eve, Mum to Charmaine "I just wanted to share that MyChoicePad has changed our lives. My son is one excellent signer, he has no vocabulary but thanks to the app he signs colours and animals fluently working on the alphabet at the moment." Sandie, Mum to Mason "MyChoicePad can be used with a broad range of speech abilities and is a lifesaver when it comes to remembering and helping others with their signs." Heather, Independent Speech and Language Therapist == About MyChoicePad == MyChoicePad Pro has been created in collaboration with The Makaton® Charity, creators of the Symbols and Signs used by Mr Tumble on CBeebies Something Special. MyChoicePad Pro is about choice and self expression. Building communication skills is at the heart of the app. Used and endorsed by leading Speech and Language therapists, it is proven to help children and adults improve key learning and communication skills. ==Subscription== MyChoicePad is accessed via a valid subscription. Subscription is available via in-app purchase. New users will not be billed for the first 7 days and may cancel their subscription at any point within this time. A subscription to MyChoicePad is a monthly renewed subscription, which will be renewed 24 hours before it ends every month unless cancelled by the user through the device settings. 2 Subscription options: - 1 User Subscription yearly for £49.99 - 1 User Subscription monthly for £4.99 A valid subscription offers these benefits: - 4000+ Makaton® Symbols and Signs - Quickly remind yourself of a Makaton® Symbol or Sign by looking it up in the MyChoicePad Library. - Grids for everything - Use Makaton Symbols to build Grids that help encourage communication and vocabulary development in any situation. Example Grids are included to get you started. - MyChoicePad for everyone - Personalise MyChoicePad for your User by adding your own photographs and recording your own voice. Use these customised symbols in your Grids to bring learning to life! == Created by Insane Logic, an award winning Social Enterprise == - Nominated Best Mobile App for Accessibility and inclusion at the 2015 Global Mobile Awards - Winners of BT Infinity Lab Connected Society 2014 Award - Recognised by UnLtd as one of the UK’s top 25 Social Enterprises. - Identified as one of the UK’s leading enterprises by mobile giant O2-Telefonica The Makaton® Charity receives a percentage of all sales of MyChoicePad products. See our Privacy Policy: http://www.mychoicepad.com/privacy/ Terms and conditions: http://bit.ly/1vqyARp How to cancel your subscription FAQ: http://bit.ly/1KStTJ1

OrbitR simulates the solar system. This accurate simulation uses Newton's law of universal gravitation to calculate forces between planets in our solar system. Click to select planets, drag to move your view of the solar system and pinch to zoom. This simulation uses real units for all calculations. The various properties can be changed to observe the effect on the solar system over time. Moons and asteroids coming soon!

Interactive bridge hand analyser utilising Bo Haglund's well known double dummy solver module. Calculates makeable contracts, par contracts and par scores for any bridge hand, or for a set of hands. Select a contract and play the hand interactively to investigate various lines of play. On the opening lead the maximum number of tricks that can be made by the defenders for each possible lead is shown, assuming optimum subsequent play by the declarer and defenders. After each card is played the same information is shown for the next position, the optimum cards being highlighted in green at each stage. Enhance the experience of browsing session results on bridge websites. Bridge Solver can browse and bookmark websites, and grab hands directly from hand diagrams on web pages hosted on ACBL (several diagram formats, including ACBLmerge), BridgeWebs, Pianola, Bridge Base Online (movie links), EBU Sims, ECatsBridge Sims, Vugraph.com, Bridge-Club.org, and Altosoft.com.au. Analyse the hands through double dummy analysis or interactive card play. Tap on a link to a .PBN, .DLM, or BBO .LIN file in Bridge Solver's browser to download and import deals. Play the recorded contract(s) from a .LIN file with full double dummy analysis at each step, highlighting where the recorded line of play is non optimal. Follow the recorded line of play or investigate alternatives by choosing a different playable card at any point in the play. Alternatively, analyse deals input manually or import deals from a PBN, DLM, or LIN file on local storage. Export deals to a PBN file on local storage.
release_text: v1.17 - Incorporates updated version of Bo Haglund's double dummy solver library - Fixes a bug which prevented reading of PBN files created by WeWeWeb Bridge app v1.16.1 - Correction to aspect ratio (v1.16 release did not fit screen properly on some devices) v1.16 - Miscellaneous minor UI changes and internal changes.

description: Use your smartphone to measure the volume of music, noise or any sound and you want in decibels (dB). Ability to change the calibration settings coming soon. **If you have any feature requests or changes you'd like to see please let us know in the comments or by email.**

description: Spotty Pad games for young children was inspired by Mr Tumble’s Tumble Tap device, which features on the BBC CBeebies television channel. It is legally different. The Tumble Tap does not do anything that Spotty Pad does. Spotty Pad consists of eight games for young children. The first – Photo Show – is suitable for children of pre-reading age. It displays a photo and plays a music clip. It uses your device’s text to speech engine (we recommend the Google text to speech engine, free on Google Play) to read out the text of the photo to reinforce what everyday (mostly) images are called. You can your own images, too. The remaining games require a degree of understanding of words. In Word Tap, the child is given an image and two words – one correct and one incorrect. The child needs to tap the correct word to score a point. In other games, the child needs to know the names of colours or shapes and in the classic “I spy with my little eye” the child needs to be able to tap on the correct image from a choice of three. Chaser, Super Chaser and Duplicator are increasingly difficult games with moving circles. In the free trial version of Spotty Pad, each game can only be played five times. For full details of what Spotty Pad does and doesn’t do, see the PDF guide at www.jrsoft.co.uk/spottypad/spguide.zip
release_text: Spotty Pad version 1.5 Fixed occasional memory issues when trying to add your own photos, which would relaunch Spotty Pad and lose the added photo. This workaround lets you continue with the selected and cropped photo even though Spotty Pad is reloaded.

description: Metro10 gives you the ten must-read articles right now from metro.co.uk, based on shares, views and recency. Time is precious when you’re busy. With so much news to read every day, how do you know what to prioritise in-between your work and daily chores so that you don’t miss out? Luckily for you Metro10 helps you sort all that out! Read and share articles, then relax in the knowledge that you know what the world is talking about and relish in the fact that you’re up to date when you put the app down. There’s no need to keep looking at your phone every two minutes either. We’ll notify you when there’s more to come back to.
release_text: - You can now change how many articles to return in settings - Lazy loading articles after 5 images downloaded

description: Dressage Lite from MogSoft lets you design dressage diagrams on your Android phone or tablet which means that wherever you ride your horse or pony you can have your tests available. Tests can be created for short or long arenas and consist of one or more steps containing movements which include: Lines Circles Half-circles Serpentines Zigzags (Half-passes) Loops Pirouettes Turn-on-haunches Halts Reinbacks Changes of leg Give and retake reins Annotations Movements are colour coded into walk, trot and canter types with linestyles (dotted, dashed etc) used to indicate varieties such as collected, extended etc. The diagram displays the horse outline in leg yield, shoulder in, travers, renvers or half pass as specified. The arena can be viewed from A, B, C or E as appropriate for a rider or judge's perspective. All of the standard arena letters are available and if required a further set inbetween these can be enabled for designing freestyle tests. Settings permits a wide range of customisations such as changing colours, animations, arena styles etc. In addition to using the graphical representation of the test you can also view it as a callsheet. The descriptions are automatically created and a user supplied comment can be added. All tests are stored on your device and no internet connection is necessary when editing or viewing tests, nor is any other form of registration. When you've completed designing your test you can share it with friends if they have the app installed. Sharing is done by using existing apps on your device which could include Gmail, Google Drive etc. A comprehensive set of help pages is always available. Dressage Lite is ADVERTISMENT supported. It is also RESTRICTED to storing three tests at any one time (you must delete a test to permit a new one to be created). An unrestricted, advert-free paid version of the app, Dressage Pro is available.
release_text: Positions now displayed as horse outline of specified lateral mode (leg yield, shoulder in, travers, renvers, half pass). Edit test now uses a Direction icon to specify the direction of all movements added. Gaits are now displayed in their real speeds which can be changed in Settings->Gaits->Speeds. Your existing speed settings will be converted (eg 75 = 7.5m/s) but you may wish to review them. A new point command Annotation has been added.

description: The compass points to the Kaaba [green ring] (shortest path using the WGS84 ellipsoid) and also indicates north [black ring]. Today and tomorrow's prayer and sunrise times are displayed for your current location automatically, no need to manually enter your whereabouts. A green alarm icon means it's set and white is unset. The compass is only as good as your hardware allows, avoiding magnetic fields, placing on a flat surface, and recalibrating (such as waving your device in a figure of 8 motion) will improve the reading.

description: Minimalistic and easy-to-use unit converter, helping you to convert imperial and metric measurements quickly and accurately. Covers 9 categories: length, mass, volume, temperature, area, speed, energy, pressure, and time.

Zeezam's a single-player sequence dice game along the same lines as Generala and Poker Dice. The rules and scoring will be familiar to anyone who's played Yahtzee before. Exceptions are unused rolls are rolled-over and entering a Zeezam (all five dice showing the same face) into the Chance, 3 of a Kind, and 4 of a Kind categories scores double the normal points. The minimum possible score is 6 and the maximum is 465.

description: Please note: If you have recently created an account for the My BMW ConnectedDrive portal (www.bmwusa.com/mybmwconnecteddrive), you must log in to the My BMW Remote app using those credentials. Perhaps you are having trouble locating your BMW in a large parking lot at night or you are unsure if you have locked your parked BMW. With My BMW Remote, you will be able to access remote services to help you in these situations and more, providing you convenience and peace-of-mind. The remote functions of the My BMW Remote app provide you with a connection to your BMW via the mobile phone network. The My BMW Remote app can be used exclusively by customers with an active BMW Assist contract. 2014 and later vehicles, except X6, also require that the vehicle is equipped with the Remote Services option (option code 6AP). In order to use the BMW eDrive Services the option code 6AG is required. • After you have downloaded the app, you will need your personal access information provided in your BMW Assist contract provided to you by your dealership, in order to setup the app. If you are unsure of your username or password, please call BMW Assist toll-free 1-888-333-6118. Please be advised, if you have recently created an account for the My BMW ConnectedDrive portal (www.bmwusa.com/mybmwconnecteddrive), you must log in to the app using those credentials. Remote functions include the following: • BMW eDrive Services: Charging status and vehicle range, display of charging stations, settings relating to charging and air conditioning for departure times as well as efficiency calculation for the driver’s own vehicle use. • Remote Door Lock & Unlock: send a remote command to lock your vehicle or initiate a call to BMW Assist to unlock your vehicle. • Online search (powered by Google™): search for local businesses, restaurants, and more and transfer details to your vehicle's navigation system. • Vehicle Finder*: display current vehicle position on a map • Remote Sound Horn: send a remote command to sound the horn of your BMW to help locate the vehicle. • Remote Flash Headlights: send a remote command to flash the headlights of your BMW to help locate the vehicle. • Comfort Ventilation (NEW feature for My BMW Remote): Send a remote command to activate the ventilation immediately or schedule a time to activate the ventilation in the vehicle. *Note: Vehicle Finder only works if the vehicle is within 0.6 miles (1 kilometer) from the iPhone and the vehicle’s ignition is turned off. The following vehicles will have Remote Door Lock & Unlock, Online Search, and Vehicle Finder available: • 1 Series, 3 Series, 5 Series, or 6 Series produced March 2008 or later • X5 SAV or X6 SAC produced April 2008 or later • Z4 Roadster from Model Year 2009 or later • X1 SAV from Model Year 2013 or later The following vehicles will have Remote Sound Horn and Remote Flash Headlights available, in addition to Remote Door Lock & Unlock, Online Search, and Vehicle Finder: • X3 SAV from Model Year 2011 or later • X4 SAV from Model Year 2015 or later • X5 SAV from Model Year 2014 or later • 2 Series from Model Year 2014 or later • 3 Series Sedan from Model Year 2012 or later • 3 Series Sports Wagon from Model Year 2014 or later • 3 Series Gran Turismo from Model Year 2014 or later • 4 Series from Model Year 2014 or later • 5 Series Gran Turismo from Model Year 2010 or later • 5 Series Sedan from Model Year 2011 or later • 6 Series from Model Year 2012 or later • 7 Series from Model Year 2009 or later Additionally, the following vehicles will have the ability to use Comfort Ventilation: • All Model Year 2014 and later vehicles except Z4 Roadster. The My BMW Remote app is available free of charge to you as a BMW Assist customer. Usage is based on the general contractual and usage conditions for mobility services with BMW Assist. Please visit www.bmwusa.com/connecteddrive for more information on the wide range of services offered by BMW ConnectedDrive.

The ultimate set of utilities for undercover agents, Spy Tool Kit is seven apps in one powerful package! From covertly recording conversations to creating timely (and potentially comical) diversions, to shedding light on your, or your enemies' clandestine activities, Spy Tool Kit has everything you need, including: VOICE RECORDER – switch to ‘VOICE ACTIVATED’ and hide your device somewhere to covertly record a conversation, or switch VOICE ACTIVATION off to record dictation, a message, a concert - or anything else you can think of! Then send your recordings via email, bluetooth, etc, or save them on your SD card. Up to 4 hours recording time! SPY COMPASS - a 3D compass for tracking your adversaries! (Hold device flat for best results). DIVERSION CREATOR – distract your enemies by creating a diversion! Select from a list of sounds (POLICE SIREN, DOOR BELL, COUGHING, FARTING etc), set the timer, and place your device out of view. When the timer reaches zero, watch as all hell breaks loose, rendering your foes (or friends) vulnerable to your attack!! You can also create your own custom sounds and even use it as a personal alarm! VOICE DISGUISER – record a message, then manipulate your voice’s pitch, tone and speed to disguise it. On playback, no-one will recognize you! Move the slider to the left to sound 'demonic', to the right to sound 'cartoonish'! ANTI-TAMPER ALARM – thwart would-be phone thieves by using your device’s motion, proximity and touch sensors. Features a fake home-screen to fool your adversaries, and an obnoxiously loud siren that can only be turned down or off by you. HINT: WHEN TURNING ON, WATCH SCREEN CAREFULLY FOR INSTRUCTIONS HOW TO TURN OFF!! FLASHLIGHT – simple & efficient, without the useless ‘extra features’ of other memory-hogging apps. Includes LED on devices that support it, plus adjustable brightness. COUNTDOWN TIMER – the #1 multi-purpose timer. Use it to time everything from boiling an egg to running a marathon. Can also be used as a STOPWATCH (just press ‘START’ when counter is at 00:00:00). Have any comments or suggestions for new features/improvements? Rather than leaving a negative review, please email us at dynamominibar@gmail.com and we will do our best to keep everyone happy!
release_text: v2.0 - New 3D Compass! Several bug fixes. v1.9 - Added 'Lock Screen' option to Voice Recorder for uninterrupted covert recording. This 'Pro' version includes Voice Activation, extra Diversion sounds, plus 'Custom Sound' function, and much more! Devices without an audio player must download one to playback files from SD Card - we recommend Music Folder Player, free from Google Play Store. Anti-Tamper Alarm - HINT: WHEN TURNING ON, WATCH SCREEN CAREFULLY FOR INSTRUCTIONS HOW TO TURN OFF!!

description: Browser Booster is the ultimate optimizing tool designed to improve your internet browsing experience. Normally when you use an android device, apps and their data are stored in memory. This is how, with regular use, you can easily run out of memory, which affects slowing down one of the most used features in mobile devices: Internet browsing. For this reason we developed this application, that prevents it to happen and offers a boost of performance so you can enjoy a snappier and faster internet browsing, with less lag and better rendering speed. Browser booster adds a layer of optimization that acts immediately before your browser launches. How to use it: Launch your browser from this application, or use our home screen widget, for quicker access. Works with any browser! Feel free to contact our technical support.

DSLR Remote Controller Ext is the enhanced version of free app Dslr Remote Controller https://market.android.com/details?id=us.zig.dslr DslrRC Extended has new futures including: - extended time lapse controller with Bramping option which using Camera Bulb Mode - Hdr Controller (up to 17 Shots) - Interacting with camera The DslrRC Hardware Receiver is available for purchase at http://dslrsystems.com/?page_id=57 or build it by yourself: http://dslrsystems.com/?page_id=61 DslrRC Extended Wireless Remote Controller is the app that allows you to control most of a camera's functions from your Android device. Requirements: - Android 2.0 or Up device - Canon EOS DSLR - The Hardware Arduino Bluetooth receiver Features include but are not limited to: - Live View (basic function "Turn On/Off Live View on camera LCD") - Auto Focus - Manual focus adjustments - Capture - Video Recording (Start/Stop) - Focus Stacking Assistant - Extended time lapse controller with Bramping option which using Camera Bulb Mode - Hdri Controller with option to take up to 17 shots with 1-4Ev apart. - Focus position - Zoom - Shutter speed - Aperture - ISO speed - White Balance - Metering Mode - DOF DslrRC Extended Remote Controller has been tested with the following hardware: - Canon EOS: 5D Mk II and should work with 50D, 500D / Rebel T1i / Kiss X3, 550D / Rebel T2i / Kiss X4, 60D, 600D / Rebel T3i / Kiss X5, 7D, 1100D / Rebel T3 NOTICE: The product is not finished yet and there still might be some issues.

The program is designed to test the screen for the presence of defective (dead, broken) pixels. When you touch the screen with your finger, it (the screen) will be fully painted in one color, and broken pixel (if any) will be different from the primary color. If you have not noticed such a pixel, congratulations - you have a fully serviceable screen. The application no contains advertising!

This application allows you to measure the shortest distance between two points on the ground, the length of the large items. This is useful for measurement of land, buildings and other facilities and structures, topographic and other measurements. It is possible to remember the results of several measurements. The application uses satellite positioning system to determine the position of the points of measurement, therefore the accuracy and other characteristics depend on the sensitivity and accuracy of satellite positioning module smartphone. The application no contains advertising!

VADE MECUM JURÍDICO COMPLETO Totalmente GRÁTIS, FREE Com toda a legislação mais comumente utilizada no dia-a-dia dos profissionais do direito. Carregar livros, montes de papéis e caneta é coisa do passado. Muito útil para advogados, estudantes e concurseiros. O toque em uma palavra, artigo ou parágrafo faz com que o texto fique destacado, simulando caneta marca-texto. Insira anotações em qualquer ponto de uma lei, como se estivesse usando uma folha de papel. É a ferramenta perfeita para estudos jurídicos. Estude usando fones de ouvido: a app lê a lei e as suas anotações para você. Estude na academia, dirigindo, correndo etc. Envie suas leis com suas anotações e marcações por email, para você ou para seus amigos, para continuar os estudos no PC ou até mesmo imprimir as leis anotadas em papel. Todas as leis incluídas na app podem ser atualizadas com o toque de um botão. Sempre que um usuário encontrar um bug, é só mandar um email através da app que rapidamente ele é consertado. description: ʍ Программа считывает московские универсальные билеты (метрополитен и ТАТ). ☎ Должна работать на телефонах с поддержкой NFC ( http://clck.ru/q9aN ). description: A simple LED Studio Clock. This is the Plus version of the popular "LED Studio Clock". It offers more features (see below in the text) and is optimized for Android 3.0 (HC) or higher (ICS, JB, ...). It supports high resolutions smartphones and tablets. The clock has various widgets and lock screen widgets (available from Android 4.2). The Plus version is completely ad-free. The watches of the original manufacturer GORGY TIMING are often seen in radio and TV studios and broadcast vehicles. My clock should not be a replica of the original clock. The design of digits and the color combinations are different from the original. The Original GORGY TIMING clock are also available in Play Store: https://play.google.com/store/apps/developer?id=Gorgy+Timing If you like my clock, please rate it. Thank you!   Note: Before you leave a bad rating, please contact me! For comments or suggestions, I'm always open. (I understand only German and a little English).     Features: • Contains no Advertising • No unnecessary permissions • Suitable for all screen resolutions • Keep screen on (optional) • Switchable 12/24 hours format • Flashing colon (optional) • Fully customizable colors • Daydream for Android 4.2+ • Lock Screen Widget (1x1, 2x2, 3x3) for Andrid 4.2+ • Widgets (1x1, 2x2, 3x3, 4x4, 5x5, 6x6) • Widget transparency adjustable • Widget can optionally launch an external App • Adjustable App screen brightness • Auto hide navigation bar (optional) • Save/load of 2 user defined colors • Multi language (UTF-8) support * • Can load translation from SDcard (optional)   * Translations: If you want to help me to translate the App into other languages, please contact us by email. Thank you! I preferably need a translator for Russian and Turkish.     Already supported languages: • Chinese (Taiwan) [zh-TW] (thanks to Tom282f3) • Dutch (Belgian) [nl-BE] (thanks to Pieters) • English [en-US] • French [fr-FR] (thanks to Gilles) • German [de-DE] • Italian [it-IT] (thanks to Remigio) • Polish [pl-PL] (thanks to Roman) • Portuguese (Brasil) [pt-BR] (thanks to Ricardo) • Serbian [sr-RS] (thanks to Luka)     Warning: The keep screen on option and the daydream mode can be cause burn-in effects on AMOLED screens! Use at your own risk!     Premissions: READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE: Read optional translation file from SD card. WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE: Write sample translation file to SD card.
release_text: Changes since Version 1.24: + Color of the colon adjustable. + AMOLED display warning.

Stimulates learning of your Son with "Learn Letters" ! Learning the alphabet is the first step to begin to learn to read. The "Learn Letters" help your child to recognize the letters of the alphabet in a fun way in two options, uppercase or lowercase. * Each time the child hits the balloon with the correct letter, win a point, and every time he hits the balloon with the wrong letter, he loses a point. * * The game begins in A, and every 10 points become available the next letter of the alphabet. * * * When hit 10 points with the correct letter, you can move on to the next letter or to continue playing the same letter and learn more.

description: A game that helps your child to learn while having fun. In this game children learn the alphabet, numbers, colors, shapes and names of animals. Each selected card the application talks to the child making her memorize what that symbol means. Simple, educational, fun and interactive.

description: Minesweeper is a single-player video game. The objective of the game is to clear an abstract minefield without detonating a mine. The player is initially presented with a grid of undifferentiated squares. Some randomly selected squares, unknown to the player, are designated to contain mines. Typically, the size of the grid and the number of mines are set in advance by the user, either by selecting the numbers or selecting from defined skill levels. The game is played by revealing squares of the grid. If a square containing a mine is revealed, the player loses the game. Otherwise, a digit is revealed in the square, indicating the number of adjacent squares (typically, out of the possible eight) that contain mines. If this number is zero then the square appears blank, and the surrounding squares are automatically also revealed. By using logic, the player can in many instances use this information to deduce that certain other squares are mine-free, in which case they may be safely revealed, or mine-filled, in which they can be marked as such. Mine Sweeper is a very interesting and time killing or passing game.

app_name: Tin Tức: Doc Bao Tin Tuc Viet
description: Tin Tức - Doc Bao Viet là ứng dụng hỗ trợ bạn cập nhật, đọc những tin tức, tin mới nóng hổi nhất từ hơn 70 nguồn báo mạng uy tín. Tin Tức được thiết kế theo phong cách hiện đại mới nhất hiện nay. Ưu điểm nổi bật nhất là tốc độ tải nhanh đến mức kinh ngạc nhờ tận dụng những công nghệ truyền tải dữ liệu mới nhất. NHỮNG TÍNH NĂNG NỔI BẬT: - Được tổng hợp và tối ưu nhờ và phần mềm máy tinh ưu việt giúp các tin tức mới phân chia theo chuyên mục tổng hợp thời sự nóng nhất hiện tại ngoài việc phân chia theo nguồn tin tức như những ứng dụng khác. - Thiết kế trực quan giành tối đa không gian cho tin tức bằng việc trong suốt thanh hành động, ẩn khi không cần thiết. - Tính năng lưu tin giúp lưu lại những tin tức cần thiết tùy mục đích người đọc. - Chia sẽ tin tức đến bất cư đâu cho bất cứ ai mà bạn muốn. - Dữ liệu được đồng bộ hóa với hệ thống một cách thông minh nhằm tránh cảm giác chờ đợi tải tin. - Tìm kiếm tin tức theo yêu cầu người đọc. - Nhiều phong cách đọc báo để lựa chọn. - Hiệu ứng hình ảnh động giúp bạn đọc báo sinh động và thú vị hơn. - Danh sách truy cập báo nhanh bên phải giúp bạn tiết kiệm thời gian chuyển đổi các nguồn báo. - Nguồn tin tức phong phú tổng hợp từ hơn 70 báo điện tử uy tín: VnExpress, Dân trí, Zing News, VietnamNet, 24h, Tiền phong Online, Tinh tế, Công an nhân dân, Ngôi sao, Afamily, Số Hóa, Genk, … - Hiện tại không có bất cứ quảng cáo nào trên app. Nhưng sau này nếu cần quảng cáo để duy trì chúng tôi cam kết sẽ quảng cáo một cách khoa học, không giăng quảng cáo khắp nơi gây khó chịu cho người sử dụng. News is designed according to the latest modern styles today. The most prominent advantage is the fast download speeds thanks to the amazing technology utilizing the latest data transmission. OUTSTANDING FEATURES: - It is synthesized and optimized by computer software pros and Vietnam to help the news division categories synthesize the hottest time in addition to distribution according to news sources, such as other applications. - Intuitive design to win the maximum space in the news during the action bar, hidden when not needed. - Instant save feature that stores the information necessary depending on the purpose of the reader. - Share news anywhere to anyone you want. - Data is synchronized with the system in a smart way to avoid the feeling of waiting for downloads news. - Search news reader request. - Many styles to choose reading the newspaper. - Effects animation to help you read the paper more lively and interesting. - List of access right quick quote saves you time switch sources reported. - A rich source of information compiled from more than 70 prestigious electronic media: VnExpress, Reuters, Zing News, VietnamNet, 24h, Pioneer Online, Delicate, public security, star, afamily, number of turns, Genk , ... - There are no advertisements on any app. But later if need advertising to maintain our commitment to scientific advertising, not spread throughout the advertising annoying to users. description: Make your telephone or tablet speak to you with Voxygen’s Best-of-Vox Voices. The Becool voice reads aloud any French text. Get rid of flat voices with no expression or personality! Discover Natural and Fun Voices, and listen to a sample here: http://www.best-of-vox.com/android . Follow us on Twitter http://twitter.com/VoxygenSAS to keep up with new voices! Like us on Facebook http://www.facebook.com/voxygen.fr ★ What is it for? Various ways to use Best-of-Vox voices: voice guidance, E-books and SMS reading, ring tones, alarm clocks, Android accessibility features with Talkback and much more. Share your messages from the Best-of-Vox application on your preferred social networks: SoundCloud, WhatsApp, Skype, hubiC, Evernote, Drive, etc. ★ How does it work? The Best-of-Vox application allows you to type or paste text and to have it read out aloud by the voice that you have chosen. You can then save it as a ringtone or share it with your friends on SoundCloud ! From your emails, your Internet browser, or any compatible application, select some text and make your Best-of-Vox voice read it aloud by simply clicking on the “share” menu. ★ How to install it? Only 2 clicks to activate the Best-of-Vox voice in the Android settings that you reach from the application's main menu. Watch the installation video and follow the instructions. Please note: with Android versions prior to 4.0, one additional first click is required at the bottom of the settings list in order to activate the voice. ★ How to fix an occasional problem? – Cannot hear the Best-of-Vox: First ensure that the volume of your device is sufficient. If this is the case, than it may be that the voice's data was corrupted during or after its installation. In order to reinitiate the voice, please perform the following steps: go to “Android Settings / Applications / Manage applications / Best-of-Vox voice”, click on “Force stop”, click on “Clear data”, return to the home screen, ensure that the device is connected to a Wi-Fi network (which is required to download the data), restart the Best-of-Vox application, wait for the download and data preparation to be fully completed, enter some text and click on the “play” button. Questions? Please contact android@voxygen.fr . Credits: Moteur de synthèse vocale / Voix de synthèse / Synthèse vocale / Speech synthesis / TTS / tts / Text To Speech / Texttospeech / Speech synthesis engine / TTS engine / Synthetic voice / TTS voice : http://www.best-of-vox.com/android

description: No necesita conexión a Internet para su funcionamiento También te recomiendo "Concordancia Bíblica" - se encuentran en mis aplicaciones. Comentario Bíblico de Matthew Henry - buena herramienta para el estudio de Biblia!! Uno de los Comentarios Bíblicos más completos que se haya escrito en toda la historia de la literatura cristiana, es el de Matthew Henry, el célebre puritano inglés del siglo XVI, se enfocó en la exposición de la Palabra de Dios. Su Comentario de toda la Biblia sigue siendo uno de los más usados por predicadores y estudiantes de las Escrituras, aunque hayan transcurrido casi tres siglos desde que se publicó la primera edición. ¿La razón fundamental? Su profundidad y enfoque. El mejor comentario bíblico devocional escrito hasta la fecha, sobre el que Spurgeon afirmó: «Todo ministro de Dios debería leer el MATTHEW HENRY con plena atención por lo menos una vez.» Matthew Henry (1662-1714) nacio en Broad Oak, en el condado gales de Flintshire. Su padre era clerigo. Fue ordenado en la Iglesia Presbiteriana Britanica donde sirvio en el pastorado de Chester 1687 a 1712. En 1704 Henry comenzo a escribir su comentario en forma de Notas del Nuevo Testamento, completandose esta obra monumental poco despues de su muerte, ocurrida en 1714. Su teologia es un fiel testimonio de la verdad evangelica, enfatizando la depravacion total del hombre y la gracia soberana y salvadora de Dios. Su obra ademas, no solo demuestra una profunda capacidad de profundidad espiritual, sino la erudicion que proporciona un gran conocimiento del griego y del hebreo. Henry es recordado como pastor afectuoso, amante apasionado de la Palabra de Dios y hombre de gran integridad personal que ha dejado su huella en los corazones de innumerables cristianos que anhelan comprender mas profundamente las riquezas de las Escrituras. No internet connection needed for operation I also recommend "Bible Concordance" - are in my applications. Matthew Henry Bible Commentary - good tool for studying Bible !! One of the most complete biblical commentaries ever written in the history of Christian literature, is that of Matthew Henry, the English Puritan famous sixteenth century, focused on the exposition of the Word of God. Your entire Bible Commentary remains one of the most used by preachers and students of the Scriptures, although almost three centuries have elapsed since the first edition was published. Is the rationale? Its depth and focus. Best devotional Bible commentary written to date on which Spurgeon said: "Every minister of God should read MATTHEW HENRY mindfully at least once." Matthew Henry (1662-1714) was born in Broad Oak, in the Welsh county of Flintshire. His father was a clergyman. He was ordained in the British Presbyterian Church where he served as pastor of Chester 1687 to 1712. In 1704 Henry began writing his commentary in the form of letters of the New Testament, completing this monumental work shortly after his death in 1714. His theology is a faithful witness to the gospel truth, emphasizing the total depravity of man and the sovereign and saving grace of God. His work also, not only demonstrates a profound capacity for spiritual depth, but the scholarship that provides a great knowledge of Greek and Hebrew. Henry is remembered as a caring pastor, passionate lover of the Word of God and a man of great personal integrity who has made his mark in the hearts of countless Christians who long to understand more deeply the riches of Scripture.

Scofield Reference Notes If You liked this book you can find version without advertisement in my applications: Scofield Reference Bible For over 90 years people have relied on this reference work in their daily study of God's Word. Written originally in 1909, C. I. Scofield's intent was to provide a concise but complete tool that would meet the need of someone just beginning to read the Bible. The Scofield Reference Bible contains very brief commentary, often consisting of no more than a few sentences and several cross-references. The brevity of the notes allowed Scofield's commentary to be included in the margins and footnotes in study Bibles, which countless Christians use as their primary study Bible. The Scofield Reference Bible is a widely circulated study Bible edited and annotated by the American Bible student Cyrus I. Scofield, that popularized dispensationalism at the beginning of the 20th century. Published by Oxford University Press and containing the traditional, Protestant King James Version, it first appeared in 1909 and was revised by the author in 1917. The Scofield Bible had several innovative features. Most important, it printed what amounted to a commentary on the biblical text alongside the Bible instead of in a separate volume. It also contained a cross-referencing system that tied together related verses of Scripture and allowed a reader to follow biblical themes from one chapter and book to another. Finally, the 1917 edition also attempted to date events of the Bible. It was in the pages of the Scofield Reference Bible that many Christians first encountered Archbishop James Ussher's calculation of the date of Creation as 4004 BC; and through discussion of Scofield's notes, which advocated the "gap theory," fundamentalists began a serious internal debate about the nature and chronology of creation.

Любовь, я думаю, самое красивое чувство человека, и в этом сборнике я постаралась собрать Красивые мысли, высказывания и статусы о любви. Их тут ровно 6 000 Статусы (мысли, высказывания) упорядочены по дате - вначале самые свежие. Приложение запоминает текущий статус и вам не придется начинать все сначала. Вы также можете добавить понравившийся статус (мысль, высказывание) в избранное, выложить на Вконтакте, Одноклассники или другие социальные сети (важно, чтобы приложение было установлено на телефон), скопировать или отправить смс, все достаточно просто и удобно. Надеюсь несложный и приятный интерфейс позволит вам насладиться красивыми мыслями и высказываниями. P.S. если есть замечания или предложения - пишите постараюсь ответить всем Love, I think, the most beautiful feeling of man, and in this book I have tried to collect Beautiful sayings about love and status. They are here exactly 6000 Statuses (sayings) are ordered by date - the most recent first. The application stores the current status and you do not have to start all over again. You can also add liked status (sayings) in your favorites, put on FaceBook, YouTube or other social networks (it is important that the application was installed on the phone), copy or send sms, everything is easy and convenient. Hopefully simple and friendly interface will allow you to enjoy the beautiful thoughts and utterances. P.S. if you have comments or suggestions - please contact us try to answer all

description: Presidents of the United States of America (USA) George Washington, the first president, was inaugurated in 1789 after a unanimous vote of the Electoral College. William Henry Harrison spent the shortest time in office with 32 days in 1841. Franklin D. Roosevelt spent the longest with over twelve years, but died shortly into his fourth term in 1945; he is the only president to have served more than two terms. A constitutional amendment, affecting presidents after Harry Truman, was passed to limit the number of times an individual can be elected president. Andrew Jackson, the seventh president, was the first to be elected by men of all classes in 1828 after most laws barring non-land-owners from voting were repealed. Warren Harding was the first elected after women gained voting rights in 1920. History records four presidents – John Q. Adams, Rutherford B. Hayes, Benjamin Harrison and George W. Bush – who lost the popular vote but assumed office. John F. Kennedy has been the only president of Roman Catholic faith, and the current president, Barack Obama, is the first president of recent African descent. You must know this!

ADB Wireless (no root) by Henry This app is for developers wanting adb access over WiFi without rooting your phone. Steps to get it working: 1. Enable USB Debugging on your phone. 2. Connect your phone via usb cable to your PC. 3. Run adb tcpip 5555. 4. Run ADB Wireless (no root). 5. Connect to the IP address. To revert back to using adb via usb: 1. Run adb usb *** NO ROOT REQUIRED *** Notes: 1. The device may also revert back to USB mode after reboot. 2. USB debugging must be enabled on your device. Want this app to be in your language? Have a suggestion for this app? Please feel free to contact me if you have any questions.

description: '내버스'는 내가 탈 버스의 도착정보를 깔끔한 이미지로 한눈에 확인할 수 있습니다. 스마트한 원클릭으로, 출퇴근시간 실제 정류장에서 빠르게 내버스를 실행합니다. - 카테고리기능 : 목록별로 내버스를 추가하실 수 있습니다. - 검색기능 : 버스번호를 검색하여 도착시간을 확인할 수 있습니다. - 최근검색 : 검색바아래 최근에 검색한 버스도착 정보들이 제공됩니다. - 주간야간모드 : 오후8시까지 주간모드 이미지, 이후 야간이미지로 실행됩니다. - 날씨기능 : 현재 날씨와 오늘 저녁날씨가 표시됩니다. - 고해상도 스킨 설정 : 다양한 배경이미지를 제공하며 원하는 스킨으로 설정하실 수 있습니다. [ 내버스 검색, 추가하기 ] 1. 내가탈 버스번호를 검색하세요. 2. 정류장을 선택하시면 전광판에 도착정보가 표시됩니다. 3. 내버스로 추가하세요. 4. 앞으로는 첫화면에서 추가된 내버스를 클릭하면 바로 도착정보가 표시됩니다. (한 정류장에 내버스가 여러개일경우 계속추가하세요. 가장 빠르게 오는 버스를 확인하실 수 있겠죠?) ※ 정류장 반대방향은 '정류장방향↓' 으로 쭉내려가면(회차하고) 반대방향 정류장이 나옵니다. [ 내버스 수정, 삭제하기 ] 1. 목록에서 내버스를 클릭하여 도착정보를 확인합니다. 2. 수정을 원하는 버스를 길게클릭하세요. 3. 제목수정, 목록이동, 삭제 메뉴가 나타납니다. 많은 테스트를 거치지만, 안드로이드의 특성상 모든 버전과 기기를 완벽하게 테스트할수 없는 부분도 있습니다. 미처 체크되지 못한 오류나 버그가 발생될경우, 폰종류나 구체적 내용에 대해서 메일로 문의 주시면 업데이트시 최대한 반영토록 하겠습니다. 도움이 되는 어플이었으면 하구요, 더욱 안정적이고 편리한 어플을 제공하기 위해 지속적으로 노력하오니 개발자에게 힘이되는 좋은 평가 부탁드립니다 (_ _ ) 감사합니다! ---- 개발자 연락처 : http://cafe.naver.com/oneclickmybus 07075145425

Scene: San Francisco. Situation: The city has been taken over by masses of vicious zombies. Your Mission: Kill all invading zombies with only the help of your guns and an axe. Zombie Slasher is a first-person shooter where the player uses various weapons to kill approaching zombies. Tap on the weapon you want to use and then tap on the zombies multiple times to kill them. As the level increases, the number of zombies, their speed, and the usable weapons increase as well. Slash your way to a high score and save the world from the zombies. San Francisco is counting on you to protect what’s left; Fate has chosen you to be the Zombie Slasher!

QUICK ONLINE REFERENCE IN CLINICAL LIFE Gain easy acess to the award-winning AO Surgery Reference. AO Surgery Reference is an online repository for surgical knowledge. It describes the complete surgical management process from diagnosis to aftercare for all fractures of a given anatomical region, and also assembles relevant material that the AO has published before. It gives access to: * Hundreds of surgical procedures and approaches * Surgical decision making made easy with literature evaluated and prepared for quick reference * Hundreds of pages of previously published AO material The idea behind this service is the realization that reference in daily clinical life is often difficult. Frequently, there is little time during a hospital day to consult books or journals, or even to perform a literature search in order to gather evidence for a decision. The AO Surgery Reference allows surgeons to access much of the body of surgical knowledge for reference purposes during their clinical work. You might also want to visit the full-featured web-based version of AO Surgery Refence at www.aosurgery.org.
release_text: • The app will allow for the very first AOSpine material to be launched December 10, 2014. This is a major milestone in the AO Surgery Reference history. • Additional CMF material will be made available for AOCMF members

description: Even if you don't know anything about human anatomy, you can play this anatomy game easily and learn about locations of organs and systems. This educative game is useful especially to medical students. Also, puzzle game lovers wanting to play different game should play it. Choose one of the eight human systems: Muscular System, Cardiovascular System, Digestive System, Nervous System, Skeletal System, Respiratory System, Reproductive System, and Urinary System. Then, you see stages where you can play the poke level. To unlock scan levels, your performance at the poke levels must be at least % 50. In detailed anatomy of the system, you try to find asked part. Time is limited, so you should be fast when clicking on the region. To help you find, colour changes on the asked region. The regions that you cannot find in time are asked again. The Male Anatomy and Female Anatomy are seperated in certain systems like the Urinary System and the Reproductive System. There are specific organs and anatomies shown in great detail such as Heart Anatomy and Brain Anatomy. Who is interested in health, medical terms, and medicine should play this educational game. Commonly Asked Questions; - How many body system does it contains ? Totaly 8 human body system and their names are ; Muscular System, Skeletal System, Cardiovascular System, Respiratory System, Digestive System, Reproductive System, Nervous System, Urinary System - Is it helpful for developing the medical educational knowledge ? Of course this is the best way to learning medical education in addition to playing game. - Can we take some information additionally visual atlas ? Yes you may. - Has the game contains audio pronunciation ? Yes it has. Finally the game may suggest to whole of medical students and teachers. What's new? - Game reviews are added so you can gain insight into the games. - You can write your comments about the app and games in speech bubbles. - Game trailers and walkthroughs are added to indicate how to play.
release_text: New Levels Added - New Digestive Levels - Stomach - Gallbladder - New Urinary Level - Kidney

Литературное чтение. 1 класс. ФГОС. Ресурс предназначен первоклассникам для занятий по предмету «Литературное чтение». Приложение разработано в соответствии с требованиями Федерального государственного образовательного стандарта начального общего образования и может использоваться с любым учебником, входящим в Федеральный перечень. Приложение включает в себя набор электронных плакатов, которые в наглядной и доступной форме представят детям теоретические сведения из области литературоведения по программе первого класса начальной школы. Содержание приложения: • Малые жанры фольклора • Народные сказки • Литературные (авторские) сказки • Сказки писателей России • Сказки зарубежных писателей • Самуил Яковлевич Маршак • Корней Иванович Чуковский • Владимир Григорьевич Сутеев • Евгений Иванович Чарушин • Виталий Валентинович Бианки • Агния Львовна Барто • Книги о детях • Читаем о животных • Читаем о родной природе • О Родине и родной природе • По страницам любимых книг Система наводящих вопросов, кроссворды и загадки сделают обучение увлекательным и интересным. Интерактивные задания, включенные в каждую тему ресурса, помогут закрепить и проверить знания учащихся. Literary reading. 1 class. GEF. The resource is designed to first-graders for classes on the subject of "Literary reading." Application is developed in accordance with the requirements of the Federal state educational standard primary education and can be used with any textbook included in the federal list.  The application includes a set of electronic posters, which in a clear and accessible way children present theoretical knowledge of the field of literary criticism in the first grade of primary school. Contents of application: • Small folklore genres • Folk Tales • Literature (author) tales • Tales of the Russian Writers • Tales of foreign writers • Samuil Marshak • Roots Chukovsky • Vladimir G. Suteev • Evgeny Charushin • Vitaly V. Bianchi • Agniya Barto • Books for Children • Read about the animals • Read about the mother nature • About the Motherland and nature • pages of favorite books System leading questions, crossword puzzles and riddles will make learning fun and interesting. Interactive exercises that are included in each topic of the resource, will help consolidate and test students' knowledge.

Join the Robots on their exciting picnic adventure in the park where you will count bugs, pop color bubbles, identify shapes and more! Have fun and learn while you pack your basket along the way to feed the Robots during Picnic Time! Features: * Eight different educational games teaching the basics of colors, numbers, shapes, and more! * Collect items along the way to feed your Robots at Picnic Time! * Silly animated Robots keep your kids entertained while they learn. * Both written and audio directions allow the youngest kids to play, or allow you to mute the game if needed. * Kid tested! Kid friendly interface! Great for your preschool kids and toddlers 2-5 years. * Content developed by professional educators * Endless, engaging gameplay Educational Games: * SHAPES * Find the cookie that matches the shape. Includes basic shapes like circle, square & triangle, as well as more complex shapes like the crescent & rhombus. * COUNTING * Robot counts along as you find each of the hidden bugs. Teaches numbers and counting. * COLORS * Pop all the bubbles of the identified color. Teaches colors and color names. * SOUNDS * Listen to the sound and watch the bars light up. Tap the bars to repeat the sound pattern. Teaches pattern recognition. * FOODS * Teaches the recognition of basic fruits and vegetables as well as other common foods. * MATCHING * Find the pair of items that match. * DIFFERENCES * Identify the item that is different from the rest. * IDENTIFY PARK ITEMS * Help identify the items commonly found in the park.

Looney Tunes™ ClickN READ® Phonics incorporates the research-based curriculum of the highly acclaimed ClickN READ Phonics program and features the zany antics of Bugs Bunny, Daffy Duck,Taz,Tweety, and more. Guided by Professor Wizbot and the 100 interactive lessons geared toward children in kindergarten to third grade, kids will learn to read the correct way. Only sample lessons are available for viewing. Become a Looney Tunes Phonics subscriber to access all 100 interactive lessons. Features: -100 phonics lessons -Customizable lesson structure and entertainment content -Detailed lesson report cards -Aligns with U.S. public schools core language arts curriculum

app_name: ไพ่เท็กซัสไทย HD
description: แท็กซัสโป๊กเกอร์ชื้อเต็มชื่อว่า Texas Hold'em Poker เป็นเกมไพ่โป๊กเกอร์ที่นิยมที่สุดในโลก แท็กซัสโป๊กเกอร์ฉบับมืออาชีพที่ไทย มีเครื่องวิเคราะห์คู่แข่งแบบมื่ออาชีพ มีระบบสู้แข่งแบบเต็มพร็อม เป็นเกมไพ่โป๊กเกอร์ที่สนุกตื่นเต้นที่สุดในโลก ในเกมนี้ยังมีลักษณะอีกมากมายเพื่อเป็นพยานของคุณได้ยกระดับเป็นผู้เซียนโป๊กเกอร์ - ไอเทมที่สนุกสนาน ทิ้งไข่หรือว่าส่งดอกไม้ ทิ้งระเบิดดีกว่า ฮ่าาา เล่นไพ่อย่างเดียวมันจะเบื่อมั้ง เรามาลองใช้ไอเทมสนุกสนานเหล่านี้ด้วย - ของขวัญสวยงาม สุนัขโชคดี แหวนนำโชค กระต่ายน่ารักเป็นต้น มีของขวัญสวงงามมากมาย - มีรางวัลผลงานมากมาย ฝีมือของคุณเก่งขนาดไหน ผลงานจะได้แสดงอย่างเต็มพร้อม ให้คุณมากราบเลย - มีเพื่อนมากมาย เข้ามาเล่นเกมกับเพื่อน มาสู้กันใครสุดยอดที่สุด - มีแข่งขันหลายรอบ - ที่นี้มีแข่งขันหลายรอบ แข่งขันคัดออก แข่งขันเข้ารอบ แข่งขันชิงแชมป์ มาสู้แข่งกัน ใครเป็นผู้เซียนแท้จริงๆ Full name tag Poker Texas Hold'em Poker is the most popular poker games in the world.
